Rule Description:
Learner reference numbers must unique within the file

(error where there is more than one Learner record with the same Learner reference number)
Error Message: There must not be more than one Learner record with the same Learner reference number

Rule Description:
A learner must not have more then one Learning Delivery record with the same Aim sequence number

(error where there is more than one Learning Delivery record with the same combination of Learner.LearnRefNumber and LearningDelivery.AimSeqNumber)
Error Message: There must not be more than one Learning Delivery record with the same Learner reference number and Aim sequence number combination

Rule Description:
There must be an assessment price recorded for completed (LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 2) apprenticeship standard (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25) programmes (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1)

(error where there is no record where (AFinType = TNP and AFinCode = 2 or 4)

(This rule is not triggered by non-funded apprenticeship standards (FundModel = 99 and ProgType = 25))
Error Message: There must be an assessment price recorded

Rule Description:
A learning aim must not have Learning Delivery FAM records with overlapping dates where the Learning Delivery FAM type is Apprenticeship contract type (ACT) (LearnDelFAMType = ACT).
If there is more than one ACT record (count (records where LearnDelFAMType = ACT) > 1), the 'Date to' of the earlier record must be returned and before the 'date from' of the later record.

(error where LearnDelFAMDateFrom of the ACT is earlier than the LearnDelFAMDateTo of the previous ACT or  LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo is not known)
Error Message: The learning aim must not have more than one Apprenticeship contract type record at the same time

Rule Description:
If the Apprenticeship contract type is returned LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = ACT), there must be an apprenticeship contract type that applies from the start of the aim

(error where there is no record where LearnDelFAMDateFrom = LearnStartDate)
Error Message: The aim must have an Apprenticeship contract type in the first day

Rule Description:
If there is more than one Apprenticeship contract type record for the learning aim, the Date from and Date to dates must be consecutive.

(error where the LearnDelFAMDateFrom of the ACT record is not a day after the LearnDelFAMDateTo of the previous record (if one exists).
Error Message: There must be an apprenticeship contract type for the full duration of the aim

Rule Description:
A learner must not have different Apprenticeship contract type (ACT) codes across all Learning Delivery Funding and Monitoring records at any point in time.

(error where LearnDelFAMType = ACT and count (LearnDelFAMType = ACT) is greater than 1 and 
LearnDelFAMCode does not match across all records at any point in time.
Error Message: The learner must not have different Apprenticeship contract types recorded at the same time

Rule Description:
At any point in time, a learner must not have more than one Learning support funding record 

(error where (LearnDelFAMDateFrom >= 2016-08-01) and at any point in time count (LearnDelFAMType = LSF) is greater than 1)
Error Message: There must not be more than one LSF record at the same time

Rule Description:
If an apprenticeship programme is funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36) through a contract for services with an employer (LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearnDelFAMCode = 1), the learner must have an employment status of 'Employed'

(error where if the LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat (applicable on LearnDelFAMDateFrom) <> 10)

This rule is not triggered for
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
or
Learner has been made redundant (EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = OET and EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode =  1) on the latest LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp
Error Message: The employment status is not valid for this apprenticeship contract type

Rule Description:
For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31) an Adult skills funded English or maths aim (DD31 = Y) cannot be started while a learner is on an apprenticeship funded programme (DD32 = Y). 

(error where (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate DD31 = Y) >= (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate DD32 = Y))
Error Message: The learner is currently apprenticeship funded and cannot start an Adult skills funded English/maths aim

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1st February 2019 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2019-02-01), if the Total negotiated price is returned (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode is not null)  then the Apprenticeship financial record date must not be before the Learning start date of the learner's learning aim

(error where AppFinRecord.AFinDate < LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: The apprenticeship financial record cannot be before the Learning start date when the total negotiated price has been returned

Rule Description:
For apprenticeship standards (FundModel = 36, ProgType = 25), if there is record of an Apprenticeship Contract Type that has been returned (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType =ACT), and the achievement date has been returned (LearningDelivery.AchDate is known), then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must be the same as the Achievement date (LearningDelivery.AchDate)


(error where LearningDelivery.AchDate <> LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo of the ACT record)
Error Message: There must be a Date applies to that matches the achievement date for this aim.

Rule Description:
For apprenticeship standards (FundModel =36, ProgType = 25) if the Completion status <>1 (LearningDelivery.CompStatus <> 1) and there is record of an Apprenticeship Contract Type that has been returned (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType =ACT), and the achievement date has not been returned (LearningDelivery.AchDate is unknown) then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must be the same as the Learning Actual End Date
  

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo of the latest ACT record <> LearningDelivery.LearnActualEndDate )
Error Message: The achievement date is not known, therefore the Date applies to record must be the same as the Learning actual end date

Rule Description:
For apprenticeship standards (FundModel =36, ProgType = 25),if the 'learner is continuing or intending to continue the learning activities leading to the learning aim' (LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 1) then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must not be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo of the latest ACT record is known)
Error Message: The learner is continuing or intending to continue, therefore do not return the 'Date applies to' for the latest ACT record

Rule Description:
A learner must not have overlapping Programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) based upon the start date (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate) and the effective end date of the learning aim (DD36)

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate of any programme aim is between LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate and effective end date (DD36) of any other programme aim)
Error Message: The learner must not have overlapping programme aims

Rule Description:
T Level or T Level Foundation Year component aims or core aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 3 or 5 and LearningDelivery.ProgType =  31 or 30), must have a programme aim with the same programme type and funding model

error where there is LearningDelivery.AimType = 3 or 5
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31 or 30
and
there is no record of LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 with the same combination of LearningDelivery.FundModel and LearningDelivery.ProgType
Error Message: T Level  and T Level Foundation Year component or core aims must have a corresponding programme aim with the same combination of funding model and programme type

Rule Description:
T Level or T Level Foundation Year programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31 or 30), must have a component aim or core aim with the same programme type and funding model

error where there is LearningDelivery.AimType = 1
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31 or 30
and
there is no record of LearningDelivery.AimType = 3 or 5 with the same combination of LearningDelivery.FundModel and LearningDelivery.ProgType
Error Message: T Level and T Level Foundation Year programme aims must have a corresponding component or core aim with the same combination of funding model and programme type

Rule Description:
If a T Level technical qualification has been returned (LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468), there must be a matching programme aim with the same value of LearningDelivery.ProgType

(error where LearningDelivery.AimType = 5 and LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468 and and there is no programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) with the same combination of (LearningDelivery.ProgType)

This rule is not triggered by the Adult T level pilot
(LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 384)
Error Message: The T Level Technical qualification must have a corresponding programme aim with the same Programme type

Rule Description:
If all returned learning aims are for a T Level programme (LearningDelivery.FundModel 25 and LearningDelivery.ProgType 31), then both Learner.PlanLearnHours and Learner.PlanEEPHours must not be returned 
(error where Learner.PlanLearnHours and or Learner.PlanEEPHours is not null)
Error Message: For T Level programme learning aims, planned learning hours and Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours must not be returned

Rule Description:
For Apprenticeships, Adult skills, Skills Bootcamps, Adult Skills Fund, Non Funded or Other Adult funded learners a prior attainment record must exist on or before for the earliest learning aim start date for that provision

(Error were LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36, 35, 37, 38, 99, 81 has been returned and the prior attainment record date is not on or before the earliest learning aim start date PriorAttain.DateLevelApp > LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: There must be a prior attainment record matching the earliest learning aim start date for the learner

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1st April 2022 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2022-04-01),  and on or prior to 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate =< 2024-07-31) if the learner's Prior Attainment is full level 3 or above (PriorAttain.PriorLevel = 6,7,8,9,10, 97 or 98) and the 'Free Courses for Jobs Offer' Learning Delivery Monitoring code has been returned (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378) then the learner must be unemployed on benefits or be a Free Courses for Jobs (Level 3 Offer) Low Wage Learner

error where 
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2022-04-01
and 
PriorAttain.PriorLevel = 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 97 or 98
and
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378
and
DD38 = N 
and 
there is no record where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 382


This rule is not trigged for devolved authorities where the delivery exclusion is used (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023)
Error Message: Learner must be unemployed or return LDM 382 'Free Courses for Jobs (Level 3 Offer) for Low Wage Learners'

Rule Description:
If the Other Employment Type is ' Small or Medium Employer' then there must be a Skills Bootcamps learning aim recorded

(error where EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = OET and EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode =  2 
AND
There are no learning deliveries with ProgType = 32)
Error Message: The programme type must be Skills Bootcamps for this Employment Status Monitoring Type

Rule Description:
Skills Bootcamp component aims LearningDelivery,AimType = 3 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32), must have a programme aim with the same funding model, programme type and contract reference number

error where there is LearningDelivery.AimType = 3
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
and
there is no record of LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 with the same combination of LearningDelivery.FundModel, LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber
Error Message: SkillsBootcamp component aims must have a corresponding programme aim with the same combination of funding model, programme type and contract reference number

Rule Description:
Skills Bootcamp  programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32), must have a component aim with the same funding model, programme type and contract reference number

error where there is LearningDelivery.AimType = 1
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
and
there is no record of LearningDelivery.AimType = 3 with the same combination of LearningDelivery.FundModel, LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber
Error Message: Skills Bootcamp programme aims must have a corresponding component aim with the same combination of funding model, programme type and contract reference number

Rule Description:
If any of the learning aims are T Level funded then there must be an Occupational Specialism learning aim present in the learner's record

(error where there is a T Level funded (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31)  learning aim
and there is no learning delivery record where
LearningDelivery. LearnAimRef = ZTLOSxxx
Error Message: An occupational specialism learning aim (ZTLOSxxx) needs to be present in the learning delivery record

Rule Description:
For completed Skills Bootcamp programmes starting on or prior to 31 July 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31), the Achievement Date must be returned on the latest programme aim or at least one of the Skills Bootcamp event aims must be present in the Learning Delivery record.

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
And 
LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 
And
LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 2
And 
LearningDelivery.AchDate for the latest programme aim is not returned or NULL
And 
there is no Learning Delivery record exists where at least one aim is LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749


This rule is not triggered by:
Completed programme aims where the file preparation date is six months after the Learning Actual End Date
(LearningDelivery.AimType = 1
and
LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 2 
and 
file preparation date > 6 months after LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate)
Error Message: The achievement date or an event learning aim for Skills BootCamps (Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749) needs to be present in the learning delivery record

Rule Description:
If the Skills Bootcamp programme has been completed, one of the subject learning aims must be closed

error where
the contract reference number (LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber) on the component aim (AimType = 3) is the same as the programme aim (AimType =1)
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
And 
LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 
And 
LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 2
And 
a closed subject learning aim does not exist LearningDelivery.AimType = 3 
and 
LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not returned
and 
LARS_CategoryRef = 62 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >=  LARS_EffectiveFrom and <= LARS_EffectiveTo in LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory)
Error Message: At least one subject learning aim must be closed if the Skills Bootcamp programme has been completed.

Rule Description:
A Skills Bootcamp learner must not have open component aims where the corresponding programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) has been closed (LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is returned).

error where
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
And
LearningDelivery.AimType = 3
And 
LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not returned
And 
LearnActEndDate for the latest programme aim (AimType = 1) is returned (where programme aim has the same combination of LearningDelivery.FundModel, LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber as the component aim)
Error Message: The Learning actual end date of the component aims must be returned for this programme

Rule Description:
If there is an open Skills Bootcamp programme then there must be one of the subject learning aim present in the programme with the same contract reference number.

error where
the contract reference number (LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber) on the component aim (AimType = 3) is the same as the programme aim (AimType =1)
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
And
LearningDelivery.AimType = 1
and
LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not returned
and a subject learning aim does not exist 
LearningDelivery.AimType = 3
and
LARS_CategoryRef  = 62 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >=  LARS_EffectiveFrom and <= LARS_EffectiveTo in LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory)
Error Message: There must be a Skills Bootcamp subject learning aim in an open Skills Bootcamp programme

Rule Description:
For open apprenticeship standard programmes started on or after 1 August 2022 where the learner has previously withdrawn (LearningDelivery.CompStatus =3) or temporarily withdrawn due to an agreed break in learning (LearningDelivery.CompStatus =  6) the apprenticeship financial record date for a total negotiated price record on that withdrawn programme aim must not be on or after the learning start date of an open programme aim.

Where there is an open apprenticeship standard programme aim
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2022-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.AimType = 1
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25
And
LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not returned
and there is a closed apprenticeship standard programme aim 
AimType = 1
And
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25
and
LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 3 or 6
and
AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinDate on the closed programme aim is >= the LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate of the open programme aim
Error Message: The Total Negotiated Price Record must not be on or after the learning start date of an open programme aim where the learner has previously withdrawn.

Rule Description:
For a Skills Bootcamp learner, where the Learning actual end date has been returned  (LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is known) for the programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), it must not be before the Learning actual end date of the latest aim within that programme.  

(error where
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
and
the latest programme aim LearnActEndDate is <  latest component LearnActEndDate (AimType = 3) 
with the same combination of LearningDelivery.FundModel, LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber)
Error Message: The Learning actual end date for the latest programme aim must not be before the Learning actual end date of the latest component aim.

Rule Description:
For a Skills Bootcamp learner started on or after 1 August 2023, the Achievement date must not be before the earliest start date of any programme aims with the same contract reference number.

(error where
LearningDelivery. AimType = 1
and
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2023-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
and
LearningDelivery.AchDate is returned
and
LearningDelivey.AchDate < the earliest LearnStartDate of any programme aims (LearningDelivery. AimType = 1) with the same Contract Reference Number (LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber)
Error Message: The Achievement date must not be before the earliest Learning start date of any Skills Bootcamp programme aims.

Rule Description:
Adult skills funded English or maths aim (DD40 = Y) cannot be started while a learner is on an apprenticeship funded programme (DD32 = Y). 

(error where (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate DD40 = Y) >= (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate DD32 = Y))
Error Message: The learner is currently apprenticeship funded and cannot start an Adult skills funded English/maths aim

Rule Description:
If there is an open T Level Technical Qualification (LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468 and LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not returned) and there is an open Occupational Specialism (LearningDelivery. LearnAimRef = ZTLOSxxx and LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not returned) have been returned, these must have the same matching record of Framework code and Pathway in the Framework Aims table in LARS.

Error where
Learning Delivery record contains (
LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef where LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468,
LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef = ZTLOSxxx and where LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not returned or NULL for these learning aims
) and there is no matching record of LARS_FworkCode and LARS_PwayCode in the Framework Aims table in LARS for these Learning aims.
Error Message: The Technical Qualification and the Occupational Specialism must match on Programme Type, Framework code and Pathway in the LARS Framework Aims table

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1st August 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01),  who are Adult Skills fund funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38) and the 'Free Courses for Jobs Offer' Learning Delivery Monitoring code has been returned (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378)  for learners aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim ((LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth) >= 19 years and <=23 years) then the learner must be earning below the earnings threshold (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 391) or the learner's Prior Attainment is below a full level 3  (PriorAttain.PriorLevel =1,2,3,4,5,99)

error where 
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38
and
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378
and
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 19 years and <=23 years
and
there is no record where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 391
and
there is no record where PriorAttain.PriorLevel =1,2,3,4,5,99

This rule is not triggered for devolved authorities where the delivery exclusion is used (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023)

This rule is not triggered by
Restarts (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: The learner must be earning below the earnings threshold by returning LDM 391 or the learner's prior attainment must be below a full level 3

Rule Description:
For a Skills Bootcamp learner starting a programme on or after 1 August 2024, the learning start date of the subject learning aim must not be before the earliest start date of any programme aims with the same contract reference number.

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01
and
LearningDelivery. AimType = 1
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
and
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate of the Subject Learning aim (LARS_CategoryRef  = 62 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef)) < the earliest LearnStartDate of any programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) with the same contract reference number (LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber)
Error Message: The learning start date of this aim cannot before the learning start date of the programme aim

Rule Description:
For a Skills Bootcamp learner starting a programme on or after 1 August 2024 and on or prior to 31 July 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31), if returned, the learning start date of the event aims must not be before the earliest start date of any programme aims with the same contract reference number.

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31
and
LearningDelivery. AimType = 1
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
and
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate of event aims (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef =  Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749, Z0060439, Z0009541,Z0060440, Z0060441, Z0060442, Z0060443 ) < the earliest LearnStartDate of any programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) with the same contract reference number (LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber)
Error Message: The learning start date of this aim cannot before the learnig start date of the programme aim

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1st August 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01),  for learners aged 24  at the start of the aim (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 24 years)  who are Adult Skills fund funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38) and the 'Free Courses for Jobs Offer' Learning Delivery Monitoring code has been returned (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378), then the learner must be earning below the earnings threshold (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 391)

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 24 years
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38
and
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378
and
there is no record where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 391

This rule is not triggered for devolved authorities where the delivery exclusion is used (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023
Error Message: The learner must be earning below the earnings threshold by returning LDM 391

Rule Description:
For a Skills Bootcamps learner, if the earliest learning start date of any programme aims with the same Contract Reference Number is before 1 August 2025, an Event Indicator (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = EVI) must not be returned. 

error where
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
and 
LearningDelivery.AimType = 1   
and the earliest LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 1 August 2025 with the same Contract Reference Number (LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber) 
and there is a record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = EVI
Error Message: The Event Indicator must not be used for learning aims starting before 1 August 2025

Rule Description:
For a Skills Bootcamp learner, if the earliest learning start date of any programme aims with the same Contract Reference Number is on or after 1 August 2025 and the Event Indicator has been returned, (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = EVI)  the date applies from must be on or after 1 August 2025. 
 
error where  
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
and 
LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 
and the earliest LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 1 August 2025 with the same Contract Reference Number (LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber) 
and there is a record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = EVI and  
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom is < 1 August 2025
Error Message: The date applies from must be on or after 1 August 2025 for the Event Indicator

Rule Description:
For a Skills Bootcamps learner, if the earliest learning start date of any programme aims with the same Contract Reference Number is on or after 1 August 2025, the Skills Bootcamps event aims must not be returned.  

error where
LearningDelivery.ProgType=32 
and 
LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 
and the earliest LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 1 August 2025  with the same Contract Reference Number (LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber) 
and there is a record of LearningDelivery.AimType= 3
and
LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef =  Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749, Z0060439, Z0009541,Z0060440, Z0060441, Z0060442, Z0060443
Error Message: Skills Bootcamp event aims must not be used on or after 1 August 2025

Rule Description:
If the learner is 16 or over on the 31 August and if the aim is 16-19 funded and if the aim has EFA Funding Condition - English qualification validity category  (LARS_ValidityCategory = EFAConFundEnglish) or an aim under the King's Trust TEAM programme, the learner does not hold a GCSE English condition of funding exemption ( there is no record of LearnFamType. ECF and Learner.LearnFAMCode = 1,2,3,4), the learner's highest English GCSE grade is 3,2,1,U,D,E,F,G,X,NONE (Learner.EngGrade = 3,2,1,U,D,E,F,G,X,NONE) and the learner's planned hours are 150 or over, then the English Minimum Hours must be returned.

Error where
Learner.DateOfBirth is returned and >= 16 years on the 31 August of the current teaching year
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25
and
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 107
And
(LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = EFAConFundEnglish or (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef = 60023995,60027307,60027629,60032121,60033344 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 331))
and
there is no record of Learner.FAM LearnFamType.ECF and Learner.LearnFAMCode  = 1,2,3,4
And
Learner.EngGrade = 3,2,1,U,D,E,F,G,X,NONE
and
(Learner.PlanLearnHours+Learner.PlanEEPHours = > 150 or (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 with the latest LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate and LearningDelivery.Phours  = >150 )) 
and
there is no record where LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = EMH

This rule is not triggered by:
Learner holds a pass grade for functional skills level 2 in English and English GCSE grade is below grade 3 (LearnerFAM.LearnFamType.ECF  Learner.LearnFAMCode = 5 and Learner.EngGrade = 2,1,U,E,F,G,X,NONE)
or
T Levels that started before 1 August 2022 (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31 and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2022-08-01)
Error Message: The English Minimum Hours field must be returned for this learner

Rule Description:
If the learner is 16 or over on the 31 August and if the aim is 16-19 funded and if the aim has EFA Funding Condition - Maths qualification validity category  (LARS_ValidityCategory = EFAConFundMaths) or an aim under the King's Trust TEAM programme, the learner does not hold a GCSE Maths condition of funding exemption ( there is no record of LearnFamType. MCF and Learner.LearnFAMCode = 1,2,3,4), the learner's highest Maths GCSE grade is 3,2,1,U,D,E,F,G,X,NONE (Learner.MathGrade = 3,2,1,U,D,E,F,G,X,NONE) and the learner's planned hours are 150 or over, then the Maths Minimum Hours must be returned.

Error where
Learner.DateOfBirth is returned and >= 16 years on the 31 August of the current teaching year
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25
and
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 107
And
(LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = EFAConFundMaths or (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef = 60023995,60027307,60027629,60032121,60033344 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 331))
and
there is no record of Learner.FAM LearnFamType.MCF and Learner.LearnFAMCode = 1,2,3,4
And
Learner.MathGrade = 3,2,1,U,D,E,F,G,X,NONE
and
(Learner.PlanLearnHours+Learner.PlanEEPHours = > 150 or (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 with the latest LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate and LearningDelivery.Phours  = >150 )) 
and
there is no record where LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = MMH

This rule is not triggered by:
Learner holds a pass grade for functional skills level 2 in Maths and Maths GCSE grade is below grade 3 (LearnerFAM.LearnFamType.MCF and Learner.LearnFAMCode = 5 and Learner.MathGrade = 2,1,U,E,F,G,X,NONE)
or
T Levels that started before 1 August 2022 (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31 and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2022-08-01)
Error Message: The Maths Minimum Hours field must be returned for this learner

Rule Description:
If there is a component aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 3), there must be a matching programme aim with the same value of LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.FworkCode and LearningDelivery.PwayCode or LearningDelivery.StdCode

(error where there is no programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) with the same combination of (LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.FworkCode and LearningDelivery.PwayCode) or LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.StdCode
Error Message: All aims that are part of a programme must have a corresponding programme aim with the same Programme type and Standard code

Rule Description:
If there is an open programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate = unknown), there must be an associated component aim

(error where there is no component aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 3 or 5) with the same combination of (LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.FworkCode and LearningDelivery.PwayCode) 
or 
LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.StdCode
Error Message: An open programme must have an associated learning aim with the same Programme type and Standard code

Rule Description:
A learner must not have more than one Learner Employment Status record with the same Date employment status applies.

(error where there is more than one record for the learner with the same LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp)
Error Message: The learner must not have more than one Learner Employment status record with the same Date employment status applies

Rule Description:
A learner must not have more than one LLDD and Health Problem record (LLDDandHealthProblem.LLDDCat) with the same LLDD and health problem category

(error where There is more than one record for the learner with the same LLDDandHealthProblem.LLDDCat)
Error Message: The learner must not have more than one LLDD and Health Problem record with the same LLDD and health problem category

Rule Description:
There must not be more than one Learner Provider Specified Monitoring record with the same Occurrence code

(error where there is more than one record for the learner with the same ProviderSpecLearnerMonitoring.ProvSpecLearnMonOccur)
Error Message: The learner must not have more than one Learner Provider Specified Monitoring record with the same occurrence code

Rule Description:
There must not be more than one Learning Delivery Provider Specified Monitoring record with the same Occurrence code

(error where There is more than one record for the learning aim with the same ProviderSpecDeliveryMonitoring.ProvSpecDelMonOccur)
Error Message: The learning aim must not have more than one Learning Delivery Provider Specified Monitoring record with the same occurrence code

Rule Description:
There must not be more than one Learner Funding and Monitoring (FAM) record with the same Learner FAM type (LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType) and Learner FAM code (LearnerFAM.LearnFAMCode)

(error where there is more than one record for the learner with the same combination of LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType and LearnerFAM.LearnFAMCode)
Error Message: The learner must not have more than one Learner Funding and Monitoring record with the same FAM type and code

Rule Description:
For any given learning aim there must not be more than one LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryFAM with the same combination of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode

(error where there is more than one record for  LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryFAM with the same combination of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode)

(This rule is not triggered by Learning Support Funding records (LearnDelFAMType = LSF), Apprenticeship Contract Type records (LearnDelFAMType = ACT) or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary records (LearnDelFAMType = ALB)
Error Message: The learning aim must not have more than one Learning Delivery FAM record with the same FAM type and code

Rule Description:
An open (LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate = unknown), non-funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99), programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), must not have a funded component aim with the same combination of Programme type, Framework code, Pathway and Standard code (including traineeships)

(error where there is a matching (same combination of LearningDelivery.ProgType, LearningDelivery.FworkCode, learningDelivery.PwayCode and LearningDelivery.StdCode (where applicable)), funded component aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 3 and LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 99))
Error Message: A funded component aim must not have a non-funded programme aim

Rule Description:
If there is more than one occurance of a core aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 5) they must not overlap

(error where there are overlapping core aims based upon LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate and LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate)
Error Message: The learner must not have more than one core aim at the same time

Rule Description:
There should not be more than one Learner record with the same ULN, except where the ULN is 9999999999

(error where Learner.ULN is not 9999999999 
and there is more than one occurance in the file with the same ULN)
Error Message: The ILR file should not have more than one record with the same ULN

Rule Description:
A learning aim must not have Learning Delivery FAM records with overlapping dates of certain Learning Delivery FAM types (Learning Support Funding (LSF) or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary (ALB)). Each type is treated separately.  

(error where there is more than one occurrance of either  LearnDelFAMType = (LSF and ALB) and the corresponding  'Date to' (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo) of the earlier record is after the corresponding  'Date from' (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom) of the later record).
Error Message: The learning aim must not have more than one Learning Support Funding record at the same time

Rule Description:
A 16-19 EFA funded learner (FundModel = 25)  must have at least one core aim (AimType = 5).

(error where AimType <>5)

This rule is not triggered by LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 105
Error Message: The learner must have a core aim for this Funding model

Rule Description:
A funded component aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 3) must have a corresponding programme aim with the same combination of Funding model, Programme type, Framework code, Pathway and Standard code

(error where there not a programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType= 1) with the same combination of (LearningDelivery.FundModel and LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.FworkCode and LearningDelivery.PwayCode) or LearningDelivery.FundModel and LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.StdCode 

(This is not triggered by non funded component aims (AimType = 3 and FundModel = 99))
Error Message: All funded component aims must have a corresponding programme aim with the same Programme type and Standard code

Rule Description:
There must not be more than one Learning Delivery Work Placement record with the same combination of Work placement start date (LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceStartDate) and Work placement employer identifier (LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEmpd)

(error where There is more than one record for this learning aim with the same combination of LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceStartDate and LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEmpd
Error Message: The learner must not have more than one Learning Delivery Work Placement record with the same Work placement start date and Work placement employer identifier

Rule Description:
For funding model 36 aims (LearningDelivery.FundModel =36), there must not be more than one Apprenticeship Financial Record with the same combination of Apprenticeship financial type, Apprenticeship financial code and Apprenticeship financial date across all apprenticeship  programme aims (Learning.Delivery.AimType = 1 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 2, 3, 20, 21, 22, 23, or 25) for a given apprenticeship matching on standard code (LearningDelivery.StdCode)
 or framework code (LearningDelivery.FworkCode)

(error where there is more than one financial record with the same combination of AFinType, AFinCode and AFinDate)
Error Message: The learner must not have more than one Apprenticeship Financial Record with the same Apprenticeship financial type, code and date

Rule Description:
For Apprenticeship trailblazer standards (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 81 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), for all programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) with the same combination of LearningDelivery.LearnRefNumber, LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.StdCode and where 2/3 of the total negotiated price is less than or equal to the core government contribution cap for the standard (DD17 = N).  

The employer contribution payments recorded for an apprenticeship standard must not exceed the employer contribution proportion of the total negotiated price for the programme.

(error where (SUM( AFinAmount where AFinType = PMR and AFinCode = 1, 2 ) 
MINUS
SUM( AFinAmount where AFinType = PMR and AFinCode = 3 )) 
GREATER THAN
1/3 * (
(AFinAmount where AFinType = TNP and AFinCode = 1 and AFinDate is the most recent) 
PLUS 
(AFinAmount where AFinType = TNP and AFinCode = 2 and AFinDate is the most recent))
Error Message: The payment amounts must not exceed the employer contribution proportion of the total negotiated price

Rule Description:
For Apprenticeship trailblazer standards (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 81 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), for all programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) with the same combination of LearningDelivery.LearnRefNumber, LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.StdCode and where 2/3 of the total negotiated price is greater than the core government contribution for the standard:  (DD17 = Y).  

The employer contribution payments recorded for an apprenticeship standard must not exceed the employer contribution proportion of the total negotiated price for the programme. 

(error where (SUM( AFinAmount where AFinType = PMR and AFinCode = 1, 2 ) 
MINUS
SUM( AFinAmount where AFinType = PMR and AFinCode = 3 )) 
GREATER THAN 
((AFinAmount where AFinType = TNP and AFinCode = 1 and AFinDate is the most recent) 
PLUS 
(AFinAmount where AFinType = TNP and AFinCode = 2 and AFinDate is the most recent))
MINUS
LARS_StandardFunding.LARS_CoreGovContributionCap where LARS_CoreGovContributionCap is the cap applicable on the earliest (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate or LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate)
Error Message: The payment amounts must not exceed the employer contribution proportion of the total negotiated price

Rule Description:
Where the Learning actual end date has been returned  (LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is known) for the programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), it must not be before the Learning actual end date of the latest aim within that programme.  

(error where the latest programme aim LearnActEndDate is <  latest component LearnActEndDate (AimType = 3) 
with the same combination of ProgType FworkCode, PwayCode and StdCode

(This rule is not triggered for English and maths component aims (
AimType = 3, and  (LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef, and LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35)
)
Error Message: The Learning actual end date for the latest programme aim must not be before the Learning actual end date of the latest component aim (not including English and maths)

Rule Description:
A learner must not have open component aims where the corresponding programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1)  has been closed (LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is known)

(error where there is a component aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 3) where LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is unknown or null, with the same combination of (LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.FworkCode and LearningDelivery.PwayCode) or LearningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.StdCode

(This rule is not triggered for English and maths component aims (
AimType = 3 and  (LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef, and LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35)
Error Message: The Learning actual end date of the component aims must be returned for this programme

Rule Description:
A learner must not have more than one Work placement record with the same Work placement start date.

(Error where there is more than one record for the learner with the same LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceStartDate)
Error Message: The learner must not have more than one Learning Delivery Work Placement record with the same Work placement start date

Rule Description:
A learner must not have consecutive Learner Employment Status records with the same Employment status, Employer ID (including where Employer ID is null) and Employment status monitoring types and codes.

(error where there is more than one record consecutively (based on LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp) for the learner with the same combination of LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat, LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpId, EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType and EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode)
Error Message: The learner must not have consecutive Learner Employment status records with the same Employment status, Employer identifier, Agreement Identifier and Employment Status Monitoring

Rule Description:
If returned, the Date employment status applies (LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp is known), must not be after the current teaching year

(error where LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp > the current teaching year)
Error Message: The Date employment status applies must not be after the current teaching year

Rule Description:
If returned, the Date employment status applies (LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp is known), must not be before 1 August 1990 

(error where LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp < 1990-08-01)
Error Message: The Date employment status applies must not be before 1 August 1990

Rule Description:
If returned, the Employer identifier (LearningEmploymentStatus.EmpId is known) must either be the default number or be a valid lookup on the EDS system 

(error where LearningEmploymentStatus.EmpID is <> (999999999 or a valid lookup on edrs_lookup))
Error Message: The Employer identifier is not valid

Rule Description:
If returned, the Employer identifier (LearningEmploymentStatus.EmpId is known), must pass the check sum calculation in DD05

(error where DD05 <> Character 9 of LearningEmploymentStatus.EmpId and LearningEmploymentStatus.EmpId <> 999999999)
Error Message: The Employer identifier does not pass the checksum calculation

Rule Description:
If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship programme (DD07 = Y), and the aim is a programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), and is 'in paid employment' (LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat = 10)on the programme start date, then there must be an Employer identifier that applies to the programme start date

(error where LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpID is unknown)
Error Message: The Employer identifier has not been returned

Rule Description:
If it is an apprenticeship and the employment status is 'Not in paid employment' then the Employer Identifier must not be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 2,3,20,21,22,23,25 and LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat = 11 or 12 and LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpId has been returned)
Error Message: The Employer Identifier has been returned and the Learner's Employment status is 'Not in paid employment'

Rule Description:
If returned, the Employment status must be a valid lookup 

(error where LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat is known and <> valid lookup on ILR_EMP_STAT)
Error Message: The Employment status is not a valid code

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2014 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2014-08-01), and adult skills, Skills Bootcamp or non funded provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35, 37, 81 or 99), and the learner is 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, an Employment status record must exist

(error where there is no Employment status record where LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp < LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate of the learning aim)

(This rule is not triggered by apprenticeship learning aims (DD07 = Y), 
or Community learning aims (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 108))
Error Message: An Employment status record has not been returned that applies prior to the Learning start date

Rule Description:
If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship (DD07 = Y) and the aim is a Programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), and the start date is on or after 1 August 2014 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2014-08-01), there must be an applicable Employment status record

(error where there is no Employment status record where LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp < LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: An Employment status record has not been returned that applies prior to the Learning start date

Rule Description:
If the Learning aim start date is on or after 1 August 2014 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2014-08-01), and the provision is 16-19 non-apprenticeship (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 or 82), and the total of the Planned learning hours and the Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours is less than 540 (sum of (Learner.PlanLearnHours and Learner.PlanEEPHours) < 540), there must be an applicable Employment status record

(error where there is no Employment status record where LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp < LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: An Employment status record has not been returned that applies prior to the Learning start date

Rule Description:
For apprenticeships (DD07 = Y), where the aim is a programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), the employment status should be employed on the start date of the aim 

(error where LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat <> 10 on the  LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)

(Not triggered for (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 353, 355))
Error Message: The Employment status on the start date of an apprenticeship programme should be employed

Rule Description:
For aims that started on or after 1 August 2016 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2016-08-01), for apprenticeship provision (DD07 = Y), that are programme aims  (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), the employment status on the start date of an apprenticeship programme must not be unknown 

(error where LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat = 98 on the employment status record that is applicable for the start date of the learning aim)
Error Message: The Employment status on the start date of an apprenticeship programme must not be unknown

Rule Description:
If the learning aim has the monitoing status of 'Learners in receipt of low wages' (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 363), the employment status on the start date of the learning aim (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate) must be 'In paid employment'

(error where LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat <> 10)
Error Message: The learner must be in paid employment for this Learning Delivery Monitoring code to be used.

Rule Description:
For Adult Skills Fund provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38), and the learner is 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, an Employment status record must exist

(error where
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38
and there is no Employment status record where LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp < LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate of the learning aim)
Error Message: An Employment status record has not been returned that applies prior to the Learning start date

Rule Description:
For the Tailored Learning provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 11) an Employment status record must exist

(error where
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 11
and there is no Employment status record where 
LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp is not on or before the
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate of the learning aim)
Error Message: An Employment status record has not been returned that applies to the learning aim start date

Rule Description:
If an Employment status monitoring type is returned (EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType is known), the Employment status monitoring code must be a valid lookup for that Employment monitoring status type

(error where EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode <> valid lookup on ILR_ESM_CODE)
Error Message: The Employment status monitoring type and code is not valid

Rule Description:
If the Date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2012 (LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp => 2012-08-1), and the Employment status is 'In paid employment' (LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat = 10), an Employment intensity indicator must be returned

(error where there is no Employment status record with a EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = EII for this LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp)
Error Message: The learner's Employment status is 'in paid employment' and the Employment intensity indicator has not been returned

Rule Description:
If the Employment status is 'In paid employment' (LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat = 10), then the Length of unemployment must not be returned

(error where EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = LOU for that Employment status record)
Error Message: The learner's Employment status is 'in paid employment' and the Length of unemployment has been returned

Rule Description:
If Employment status monitoring code is 'Learner is self employed (EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = SEI), the Employment status must be 'In paid employment'

(error where LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat <> 10 for that Employment status record)
Error Message: The learner is self employed and the Employment status is not 'in paid employment'

Rule Description:
If the Date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2012 (LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp => 2012-08-01), and the Employment status is 'Not in paid employment and looking for work' (LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat = 11), then the Length of unemployment must be returned

(error where EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType <> LOU)

(This rule is not triggered for for Employment status records that apply to 16-19 non-apprenticeship funding learning aims or skills bootcamps (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82 or 37))
Error Message: The Length of unemployment has not been returned

Rule Description:
If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship programme (DD07 = Y), and the Employment status record that applies to the start date of the programme aim (LearningDelivery.LearnSAimType = 1),  is 'In paid employment' (LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat = 10), and the Date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2013 (LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp => 2013-08-01), then a Length of Employment indicator must be returned

(error where EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType <> LOE for this Employment status record)
Error Message: The Length of employment has not been returned

Rule Description:
If the Employment status is 'Not in paid employment' (LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat = 11 or 12), then the Length of employment must not be returned

(error where EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = LOE for this Employment status record)
Error Message: The Length of employment has been returned

Rule Description:
The Date employment status applies must not be after the 'Valid to' date for this ESMType and ESMCode

(error where LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp > 'Valid to' in ILR_ESMTypeCode)
Error Message: The Employment status monitoring type and code is not valid for the Employment status date

Rule Description:
If the Date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2013 (LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStat => 2013-08-01), and the Employment status is 'not in paid employment' (LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat = 11 or 12), then an Employment intensity indicator or Self employed indicator must not be returned

(error where EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = EII or SEI for this Employment status record)
Error Message: The Employment intensity indicator or Self employed indicator has been returned

Rule Description:
If the Employment status monitoring type is SEI, EII, LOU, LOE, BSI, PEI or SEM then there must be only one occurrence

(error where EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = SEI, EII, LOU, LOE, BSI, PEI or SEM and occurrence > 1)
Error Message: There must not be more than one record with an ESM type of SEI, EII, LOU, LOE, BSI, PEI, or SEM

Rule Description:
If it is an apprenticeship standard and the Small employer indicator has been returned, then the employment status must not be 'Not in paid employment'

error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25 and EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = SEM and EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode = 1 and LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat = 11 or 12
Error Message: The Small employer indicator has been returned and the Learner's Employment status is 'Not in paid employment'

Rule Description:
If 'sector based work academies pre-employment training' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned, then the 'Learner is in receipt of Job Seekers Allowance (JSA)', 'Learner is in receipt of Universal Credit' or 'Learner is in receipt of Employment and Support Allowance (all categories)' Benefit Status Indicator must be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 375 and EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = BSI and EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode <> 1,4, 5 or not returned)
Error Message: The learner must be receiving work related benefits for this Learning Delivery Monitoring code to be used

Rule Description:
If the Employment status is 'In paid employment' (LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat = 10), then the Other Employment Type 'Learner has been made redundant' must not be returned

(error where EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = OET and EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode = 1 for that Employment status record)
Error Message: The redundancy indicator has been returned and the Learner's Employment status is 'In paid employment'

Rule Description:
If the Other Employment Type is ' Small or Medium Employer' then the learner's employment status must be 'In paid employment'

(error where EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = OET and EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode =  2
AND
LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat <> 10 or not returned)
Error Message: The 'Small or Medium Employer' indicator has been returned but the Learner's Employment status is 'Not in paid employment'

Rule Description:
If the Other Employment Type has been returned there must not be more than one occurrence of the same code for the employment status record

(error where EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = OET and EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode and occurrence of the same ESMcode > 1)
Error Message: There must not be more than one of the same OET codes recorded on the employment status

Rule Description: The number of digits for Accommodation must be 1
Error Message: The value returned for Accom is not 1 character long

Rule Description: The Additional delivery hours must be between 1 and 4 digits long
Error Message: The length of the value returned for AddHours is not between 1 and 4 characters

Rule Description: The AddHours must be in the range stated in the ILR specification
Error Message: The AddHours is out of range

Rule Description: The number of characters for Address line 1 must be 50 or less
Error Message: The length of the value returned for AddLine1 is not between 1 and 50 characters

Rule Description: The AddLine1 must match the validation pattern in the ILR specification
Error Message: The AddLine1 does not match the validation pattern

Rule Description: The number of characters for Address line 2 must be 50 or less.
Error Message: The length of the value returned for AddLine2 is not between 1 and 50 characters

Rule Description: The AddLine2 must match the validation pattern in the ILR specification
Error Message: The AddLine2 does not match the validation pattern

Rule Description: The number of characters for Address line 3 must be 50 or less.
Error Message: The length of the value returned for AddLine3 is not between 1 and 50 characters

Rule Description: The AddLine3 must match the validation pattern in the ILR specification
Error Message: The AddLine3 does not match the validation pattern

Rule Description: The number of characters for Address line 4 must be 50 or less.
Error Message: The length of the value returned for AddLine4 is not between 1 and 50 characters

Rule Description: The AddLine4 must match the validation pattern in the ILR specification
Error Message: The AddLine4 does not match the validation pattern

Rule Description: The Apprenticeship Financial Amount must be between 1 and 6 characters long
Error Message: The length of the value returned for AFinAmount is not between 1 and 6 characters

Rule Description: The AFinAmount must be in the range stated in the ILR specification
Error Message: The AFinAmount is out of range

Rule Description: AFinAmount is mandatory
Error Message: The Apprenticeship Financial Amount has not been returned

Rule Description: The Apprenticeship Financial Code must be between 1 and 2 characters long
Error Message: The length of the value returned for AFinCode is not between 1 and 2 characters

Rule Description: AFinCode is mandatory
Error Message: The Apprenticeship Financial Code has not been returned

Rule Description: AFinDate is mandatory
Error Message: The Apprenticeship Financial Record Date has not been returned

Rule Description: The Apprenticeship Financial Type must be between 1 and 3 characters long
Error Message: The length of the value returned for AFinType is not between 1 and 3 characters

Rule Description: The AFinType must match the validation pattern in the ILR specification
Error Message: The AFinType does not match the validation pattern

Rule Description: AFinType is mandatory
Error Message: The Apprenticeship Financial Type has not been returned

Rule Description: The number of digits for Aim sequence number must be 2 or less
Error Message: The length of the value returned for AimSeqNumber is not between 1 and 2 characters

Rule Description: The AimSeqNumber must be in the range stated in the ILR specification

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is OfS funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1), then the Equivalent or lower qualification must be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.ELQ is unknown)
Error Message: The ELQ must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.ELQ is known), the ELQ must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.ELQ <> valid lookup on ILR_ELQ)
Error Message: The ELQ is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If returned, the Financial support type (LearnerHEFinancialSupport.FINTYPE is known), must be a valid lookup

(error where LearnerHEFinancialSupport.FINTYPE <> a valid lookup on ILR_FINTYPE)
Error Message: The Financial support type is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the Financial support type is 'Cash', 'Near cash', 'Accommodation discounts' or 'Other', there must be only one occurrence of that type

(error where LearnerHEFinancialSupport.FINTYPE = 1, 2, 3 or 4 and occurrence > 1)
Error Message: There must not be more than one record with a Financial support type of Cash, Near cash, Accommodation discounts, or Other

Rule Description:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDCOMP is returned) then the Completion of year of instance must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDCOMP <> valid lookup in ILR_FundComp)

This rule is not triggered where:
OfSProviders.HEFundingFieldsRequired = 0
Error Message: The Completion of year of instance is not valid

Rule Description:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDLEV is returned) then the Level applicable to Funding Council HESES must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDLEV <> valid lookup in ILR_FundLev)
Error Message: The Level applicable to Funding Council HESES is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2009 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2009-08-01), and the learning aim type in the LARS database is an undergraduate learning aim (LARS_LearnAimRefType = (0394, 1406, 1407, 1408, 9000, 9002, 9107, E007, 9112, 9111, 9110 or 9113) where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef), then the Level applicable to Funding Council HESES field should be 'undergraduate' or 'Not in HESES population'

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDLEV <> 10, 11 or 99)
Error Message: The Level applicable to Funding Council HESES is not valid for this type of learning aim

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2009 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2009-08-01), and the learning aim type in the LARS database is a postgraduate learning aim (LARS_LearnAimRefType = (0393, 1410, 2001, 9100, 9101, 9109, E008, 1411, 1412 or 9103) where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef), then the Level applicable to funding council HESES should be 'postgraduate' or 'Not in HESES population'

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDLEV <> 20, 21, 30, 31 or 99)
Error Message: The Level applicable to Funding Council HESES is not valid for this type of learning aim

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01), then Level Applicable to Funding Council HESES must be returned

(error where
Learning Delivery HE data set is returned
and
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01
and
 LearningDeliveryHE.Level Applicable to Funding Council HESES is null or not returned

This rule is not triggered where:
OfSProviders.HEFundingFieldsRequired = 0
Error Message: The Level Applicable to Funding Council HESES  must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If the Net tuition fee is returned (LearningDeliveryHE.NETFEE is known), then the Gross tuition fee must be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.GROSSFEE is unknown)
Error Message: The Gross tuition fee must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.GROSSFEE is known), the Gross tuition fee must be equal to or greater than the Net tuition fee

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.GROSSFEE < LearningDeliveryHE.NETFEE)
Error Message: The Gross tuition fee must be equal to or greater than the Net tuition fee

Rule Description:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.GROSSFEE is known), the Gross tuition fee should not be greater than 9535

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.GROSSFEE > 9535)
Error Message: The Gross tuition fee must not be greater than 9535

Rule Description:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.HEPostCode is known), the HE centre location postcode should be a valid postcode on the list of complete UK postcodes table or be ZZ99 9ZZ

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.HEPostCode <> valid lookup on PAF_ILR_Postcodes or <> ZZ99 9ZZ)
Error Message: The HE centre location postcode should be a valid postcode on the list of complete UK postcodes table or be ZZ99 9ZZ

Rule Description:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.HEPostCode is known), the Postcode must conform to the valid postcode format

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.HEPostCode <> valid format of 1 or 2 capital letters followed by (1 or 2 numbers or 1 number and a capital letter) and the second part <> valid format of (nXX) where n = 0-9 and XX are capital letters excluding C, I, K, M, O and V)
Error Message: The Postcode must conform to the valid postcode format

Rule Description:
If the Learner HE record is returned (Learner.LearnerHE is known), then there must be a Learning Delivery HE record

(error where there is no record of LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE)
Error Message: A Learning Delivery HE record must be returned

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is Office for Students (OfS) funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1)), then the Learning Delivery HE record must be returned

(Error where LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is unknown)

(This rule is not triggered by records generated by HESA (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 352), or by records where LearningProvider.UKPRN = ORG_UKPRNS and LegalOrgType = UHEO)
Error Message: A Learning Delivery HE record must be returned for this Source of funding

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 35, 38, or 99), is a level 4 or above in the LARS database (LARS_NotionalNVQLevel_v2 = '4', '5', '6', '7', '8' OR 'H' where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef), and delivered by a college or grant funded provider (DD27 = Y) and the UKPRN is a valid lookup on the Office for Students register (LearningProvider.UKPRN = UKPRN.OfSProviders) then the Learning Delivery HE record must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is unknown)

(This rule is not triggered by apprenticeships (DD07 = Y). 
This rule is not triggered by records generated by HESA (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 352), or by records where LearningProvider.UKPRN = ORG_UKPRNS and LegalOrgType = UHEO)
Error Message: A Learning Delivery HE record must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is community learning funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10) and is a  level 3 or below, the Learning Delivery HE record must not be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known)

(This rule is not triggered by aims with LARS_NotionalNVQLevel_v2 = '4', '5', '6', '7', '8' OR 'H' where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef)
Error Message: A Learning Delivery HE record must not be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is part of a Higher apprenticeship (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 20, 21, 22, 23, or 25), and prescribed HE in the LARS database (LARS_EnglPrscID = 1 or 2 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef)), and delivered by a college or grant funded provider (DD27 = Y) and the UKPRN is a valid lookup on the Office for Students register (LearningProvider.UKPRN = UKPRN.OfSProviders) then the Learning Delivery HE record must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is unknown)

(This rule is not triggered by records generated by HESA (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 352), or by records where LearningProvider.UKPRN = ORG_UKPRNS and LegalOrgType = UHEO)
Error Message: A Learning Delivery HE record must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is prescribed HE in the LARS database (LARS_EnglPrscID = 1 or 2 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef)), and not being delivered by a college or grant funded provider (DD27 = N) and the UKPRN is a valid lookup on the Office for Students register (LearningProvider.UKPRN = UKPRN.OfSProviders) then the Learning Delivery HE record should be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is unknown)

(This rule is not triggered by records generated by HESA (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 352), or by records where LearningProvider.UKPRN = ORG_UKPRNS and LegalOrgType = UHEO)
Error Message: A Learning Delivery HE record must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is Tailored learning funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 11) and is a  level 3 or below, the Learning Delivery HE record must not be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known)

(This rule is not triggered by aims with LARS_NotionalNVQLevel_v2 = '4', '5', '6', '7', '8' OR 'H' where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef)
Error Message: A Learning Delivery HE record must not be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2025-08-01 the learning delivery HE entity must not be returned on the programme aim.

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2025-08-01 and  LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1)
Error Message: A programme aim must not have the HE dataset returned

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), then the Mode of study must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.MODESTUD <> valid lookup ILR_ModeStud)
Error Message: The Mode of study is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2009 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2009-08-01), and the Special fee indicator field is 'final year of a full-time course lasting less than 24 weeks' (LearningDeliveryHE.SPECFEE = 4 or 5), then the Mode of study field must be 'part-time'

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.MODESTUD <> 3
Error Message: The Mode of study is not valid for this Special fee indicator

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), then the Major source of tuition fees must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE <> valid lookup in ILR_MSTUFEE)
Error Message: The Major source of tuition fees is not valid

Rule Description:
The Learning start date must not be after the 'Valid to' date in the Major source of tuition fees lookup table

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >  'Valid to' in ILR_MSTUFEE for this LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE)
Error Message: The Major source of tuition fees is not valid for this Learning start date

Rule Description:
If the Country of Permanent Address is Scotland (LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY = XH), the Major source of tuition fees should not be 'English or Welsh LEA award' or 'DELNI/Northern Ireland Education and Library Boards'

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE = 2 or 4)
Error Message: The Major source of tuition fees is not consistent with the Country of Permanent Address

Rule Description:
If the Country of Permanent Address is Northern Ireland (LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY = XG), the Major source of tuition fees should not be 'English or Welsh LEA award' or 'Student Awards Agency for Scotland'

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE = 2 or 3)
Error Message: The Major source of tuition fees is not consistent with the Country of Permanent Address

Rule Description:
If the Country of Pemanent Address is England or Wales (LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY = XF or XI), the Major source of tuition fees should not be 'Student Awards Agency for Scotland' or 'DELNI/Northern Ireland Education and Library Boards'

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE = 3 or 4)
Error Message: The Major source of tuition fees is not consistent with the Country of Permanent Address

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2021 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2021-08-01) and on or prior to 31 July 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31)
and and the Major Source of Tuition Fees is  'English or Welsh LEA award', 'Student Awards Agency for Scotland (SAAS)',  'DELNI/Northern Ireland Education and Library Boards',  'Mix of learner and SLC, 'Mix of learner and SAAS/SLC' or 'Mix of learner and DELNI/NIELB' then the Student Support Number should be returned.

Error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2021-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31
and 
LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE = 02, 03, 04, 52, 53, 54 and LearningDeliveryHE.SSN is not returned
Error Message: As Major Source of Tuition Fees 02, 03, 04, 52, 53, 54 has been recorded then the Student Support Number should be returned

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2025-08-05) and the Major Source of Tuition Fees is  Student Awards Agency for Scotland (SAAS) or Student Loans Company (SLC) then the Student Support Number should be returned.

Error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2025-08-01 and LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE = 03,10 and LearningDeliveryHE.SSN is not returned
Error Message: As Major Source of Tuition Fees 03 or 10 has been recorded then the Student Support Number should be returned

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2012 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2012-08-01), and the Student support number has not been returned (LearningDeliveryHE.SSN is unknown), then the Net tuition fee must be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.NETFEE is unknown)
Error Message: The Net tuition fee must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.NETFEE is known), the Net tuition fee should not be greater than 9535

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.NETFEE > 9535)
Error Message: The Net tuition fee should not be greater than 9535

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2013-08-01), and the Subcontracted or partnership UKPRN has been returned (LearningDelivery.PartnerUKPRN is known), then the Percentage not taught by this institution must be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.PCOLAB is unknown)
Error Message: The Percentage not taught by this institution must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2013-08-01), then the Country of Permanent Address must be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY is unknown)
Error Message: The Country of Permanent Address must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY is known), the Country of Permanent Address must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY <> valid lookup)
Error Message: This is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2010 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2010-08-01), then the Qualification on entry must be returned 

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.QUALENT3 is unknown)
Error Message: The Qualification on entry must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If returned, the Qualification on entry (LearningDeliveryHE.QUALENT3 is known), must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.QUALENT3 <> valid lookup in ILR_QualEnt3
Error Message: The Qualification on entry is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.QUALENT3 is known), the Learning start date must not be after the 'Valid to' date in the Qualification on entry lookup table 

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 'Valid_To' date in ILR_QualEnt3 for this LearningDeliveryHE.QUALENT3)

This rule is not triggered by restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: The Qualification on entry is not a valid code for this Learning start date

Rule Description:
