If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.SEC is known), the Socio-economic classification must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.SEC <> valid lookup in ILR_SEC)
Error Message: The Socio-economic classification is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2013-08-01), the UCAS Scheme Code has been returned (LearningDeliveryHE.UCASSCHEMECODE is known), and Country of Permanent Address code is within the British Isles (LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY = 'XF', 'XG', 'XH', 'XI', or 'XK'), then the Socio-economic classification must be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.SEC is unknown)
Error Message: The Socio-economic classification must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2013-08-01), the UCAS Scheme Code has been returned (LearningDeliveryHE.UCASSCHEMECODE is known), and the Country of Permanent Address code is within the British Isles (LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY = 'XF', 'XG', 'XH', 'XI', or 'XK'), then the Occupation code must be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.SOC is unknown)
Error Message: The Occupation code must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.SOC is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2014 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2014-08-01), then the Occupation code must be a valid lookup from SOC ILR lookup table

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.SOC <> valid lookup in ILR_SOC)
Error Message: The Occupation code is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), then the Special fee Indicator must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.SPECFEE  <> valid lookup in ILR_SpecFee)
Error Message: This Special fee indicator is not valid

Rule Description:
If the learning aim start date is on or after 1 August 2009 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2009-08-01), and the Mode of study is 'sandwich year out' (LearningDeliveryHE.MODESTUD = 2), then the Special fee indicator must be 'sandwich placement' 

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.SPECFEE <> 1)
Error Message: The Special fee indicator is not valid for this Mode of study

Rule Description:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.SSN is known), the Student support number must pass the checksum calculation

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.SSN must pass the checksum as detailed at https://www.hesa.ac.uk/collection/c17051/a/ssn)
Error Message: The Student support number does not pass the checksum calculation

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2021 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2021-08-01), if the Student Support Number is not returned then the Net Tuition Fee and the Gross Tuition Fee should be returned.

Error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2021-08-01 and LearningDeliveryHE.SSN is not returned and (LearningDeliveryHE.NETFEE is not returned or LearningDeliveryHE.GROSSFEE is not returned)
Error Message: As the Student Support Number has not been recorded then the Net Tuition Fee and Gross Tuition Fee should be returned

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2013-08-01), then the Student instance FTE must be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.STULOAD is unknown)
Error Message: The Student instance FTE must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If returned, the Term time accommodation (LearnerHE.TTACCOM is known), must be a valid lookup

(error where LearnerHE.TTACCOM <> valid lookup in ILR_TTAccom)
Error Message: The Term time accommodation is not a valid code

Rule Description:
The earliest start date of the learning aims must not be after the 'Valid to' date in the Term time accommodation lookup table

(error where DD06 > 'Valid to' in ILR_TTAccom for this LearnerHE.TTACCOM)
Error Message: The Term time accommodation is not a valid code for this Learning start date

Rule Description:
If the earliest start date of the learning aims is on or after 1 August 2013 (DD06 => 2013-08-01), and the Mode of study is 'Full-time or Sandwich' (LearningDeliveryHE.MODESTUD = 1), then the Term time accommodation must be returned 

(error where LearnerHE.TTACCOM is unknown)
Error Message: The Term time accommodation must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), then the Type of instance year must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.TYPEYR <> valid lookup in ILR_TypeYr)
Error Message: The Type of instance year is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2009 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2009-08-01), the Learning start date and Learning actual end date are in the same academic year (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate AND LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate = same academic year), and the Completion of year of instance is code 1 (LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDCOMP = 1), then the Type of instance year must be code 1

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.TYPEYR <> 1)
Error Message: The Type of instance year is not valid for this Completion of year of instance

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2013-08-01), and the UCAS personal ID has been returned (LearnerHE.UCASPERID), then the UCAS scheme code must be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.UCASSCHEMECODE is unknown)
Error Message: The UCAS scheme code must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2025-08-01) the UCAS Scheme Code must be two alphabetic characters followed by two numeric digits.

Error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2025-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.UCASSCHEMECODE is not two alphabetic characters followed by two numeric digits
Error Message: The UCAS Scheme code must be twp alphabetic characters followed by two numeric digits.

Rule Description:
If returned, the Accommodation (Learner.Accom is known) must be a valid lookup

(error where <> valid lookup on ILR_Accom)
Error Message: The Accommodation is not a valid code

Rule Description:
The field 'Address Line 1' must be returned, otherwise error

(errror where Learner.AddLine1 is unknown)

(this rule is not triggered where all learning aims are funded by (community learning provision (FundModel = 10 or (FundModel = 99 and LearnDelFAM = SOF108)) and Learner.PlanLearnHours <= 10))
Error Message: Address line 1 has not been returned.

Rule Description:
If the Learning support cost is returned (Learner.ALSCost is known), the High Needs Student indicator must be returned

(error where LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType <> HNS)
Error Message: The Learning support cost field must only be returned for High Needs Students

Rule Description:
If returned, the Campus identifier (Learner.CampId is known) must be a valid lookup on the Campus identifier table

(error where  <> valid lookup on the CampId table)
Error Message: The Campus identifier is not valid

Rule Description:
The master UKPRN in the Campus identifier table must be the same as the UKPRN in the Header

(Error where LearningProvider.UKPRN does not match the CampID.masterUKPRN where Learner.CampID = CampID on the look up table)
Error Message: The UKPRN is not the same as recorded in the Header

Rule Description:
If the aim is funded by 16 - 19,  Adult skills, Apprenticeships, Adult Skills Fund, or Skills Bootcamp provision ( LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82, 35, 36, 37, 38, 81), the Date of birth must be returned

(error where Learner.DateOfBirth is unknown)

(This rule is not triggered by OLASS learning aims (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034)
Error Message: The Date of birth must be returned

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is Community Learning, Non-funded provision or Tailored learning (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10, 99 or 11), the Date of birth should be returned

(error where Learner.DateOfBirth is unknown)

This rule is not triggered by aims financed by Advanced Learner Loans (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ADL)
Error Message: The Date of birth should be returned

Rule Description:
If returned, the date of birth (Learner.DateOfBirth= known) , at the start of the current teaching year, must be less that 115 years of age

(error where Learner.DateOfBirth >= 115 years)
Error Message: The learner is 115 or over

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is Community Learning or Non-funded provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10 or 99), at the start of the learning aim the learner should be aged 4 or over

(error where Learner.DateOfBirth is known and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth < 4 years)
Error Message: The learner is under 4

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is 16-19 funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82), the learner should be aged 13 or over on 31 August of the current teaching year

(error where Learner.DateOfBirth is known and < 13 years on the 31 August of the current teaching year)
Error Message: The learner is under 13

Rule Description:
For learning aims which are 16-19 funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 or 82), and the learner is ages 25 or over (Learner.DateOfBirth >= 25 years) on the 31 August of the current teaching year, the source of funding must not be 16-19 funded

(error where (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 107))
Error Message: The learner is 25 or over so the Source of funding must not be EFA

Rule Description:
If the Date of birth has been returned (Learner.DateOfBirth is known) and the learner is under 19 at the start of learning (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth < 19 years), and the learning aim is Community Learning funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10), the  PCDL or NLDC codes must not be returned

(error where (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ASL and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1 or 2))
Error Message: The learner is under 19 and the Community Learning provision is PCDL or NLDC

Rule Description:
If the learner's learning aim is funded by the Office for Students (OfS) (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1), the learner should be over 16 on 31 July of the current teaching year

(error where Learner.DateOfBirth <> null < 16 years on 31 July of the current teaching year)
Error Message: The learner is OfS funded and should not be under 16 years old

Rule Description:
If the learner is an 'OLASS - Offender in custody' (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 or 81 and (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034)), the learner should be 18 or over at the start of learning

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth < 18 years)
Error Message: The learner is under 18

Rule Description:
For aims that are 16-19 funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 or 82), and the learner is under 19 (Learner.DateOfBirth < 19) on 31 August of the current teaching year, the source of funding must be 16-19

(error where (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode <> 107))
Error Message: The learner is under 19 and the Source of funding is not the EFA

Rule Description:
If the learner is financed by an Advanced Learner Loan (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ADL), the Date of birth must be returned 

(error where Learner.DateOfBirth is not known

(This rule is not triggered by OLASS learning aims (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034))
Error Message: The Date of birth has not been returned

Rule Description:
If the Unique learner number is known and is not the default value (Learner.ULN <> 9999999999), then the Date of birth must be returned

(error where Learner.DateOfBirth is not known)
Error Message: The Unique learner number has been returned and the Date of birth has not been returned

Rule Description:
If the learner is adult skills (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 and DD07 = N) or Skills Bootcamps funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37), Adult Skills Fund (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38) the learner must be 19 or over on 31 August of the current teaching year

(error where Learner.DateOfBirth < 19 years on 31 August of the current teaching year)

(This rule is not triggered by OLASS learning aims (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034)),
Error Message: The learner is under 19

Rule Description:
If the learner is financed by an Advanced Learner Loan (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ADL), the learner must be 19 or over at the start of the learning aim

(Error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate -  Learner.DateOfBirth < 19 years)
Error Message: The learner is under 19 and financed by an Advanced Learner Loan

Rule Description:
The learner's Date of birth (Learner.DateOfBirth is known), must not be on or after the start of the current teaching year

(error where Learner.DateOfBirth >= the start of the current teaching year)
Error Message: The learner's Date of birth is on or after the start of the current teaching year

Rule Description:
If the learner is aged 19 to 24 on 31 August of the current teaching year (Learner.DateOfBirth 19 to 24 years on 31 August of the current teaching year), and is agency funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82, 35, 38 or 81), and the learner has a 'Education health care plan' (LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = EHC), then the Source of funding must be the EFA

(error where (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode <>107))

(This rule is not triggered by OLASS learning aims (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034), or apprenticeships (DD07 =Y))
Error Message: The learner is between 19 and 24 and has an Education health plan, and the Funding model and/or Source of funding is not the EFA

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2015 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2015-08-01) and on or prior to 31 July 2016 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2016-07-31), and the learner is 24 or over at the start of the aim (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 24 years)  and the notional NVQ level of the aim is level 3 or above (LARS_NotionalNVQLevel_v2 = 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 or = H), then the Funding model must not be Adult skills

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35)

(This rule is not trigged by apprenticeships (DD07 = Y),
OLASS learners (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034),
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES),
Trade union aims (LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory.CategoryRef = 19),
or by providers with an organisation type of Specialist Designated College (LearningProvider.UKPRN = Org_Details.UKPRN and LegalOrgType = USDC), 
Steel Industries Redundancy Training (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 347)
Error Message: The learning aim started on or after 1 August 2015 and the learner is 24 or over and the aim is Level 3 or above and the Funding model is Adult skills

Rule Description:
If the learner is age 19 to 24 on 31 August (Learner.DateOfBirth 19 to 24 years on 31 August of the current teaching year), and is a 16-19 funded High Needs Student (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 and LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = HNS), the learner must have an 'Education health care plan'

(error where there is no record of LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = EHC)
Error Message: The learner is recorded as a High Needs Student but there is no Education health care plan recorded

Rule Description:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2014 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2014-08-01), and on or before 31 July 2016 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate =< 2016-07-31), that are an apprenticeship standard(LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 or 81 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), and a programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), and if the learner is 19 or over (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 19 year), then the minimum duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 365 days

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate < 365 days)

(This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES))
Error Message: The learner is 19 or over and the planned duration of the programme does not reach the required minimum duration of an apprenticeship

Rule Description:
For aims starting on or before 31 July 2016 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate =< 2016-07-31), that are an apprenticeship standard (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 or (81 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), and a programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), and if the learner is 19 or over (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 19 year), and the outcome is achieved (LearningDelivery.Outcome = 1), then the minimum duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 365 days

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate < 365 days
(This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES))
Error Message: The learner is 19 or over and the actual duration of the programme does not reach the required minimum duration of an apprenticeship

Rule Description:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2016 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2016-08-01) and on or prior to 31 July 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31)  that are an apprenticeship standard (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 81 or 36 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), and a programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), and if the learner is 16 or over (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 16 year),  then the minimum planned duration of the apprenticeship must be 365 days or more

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate < 365 days)

(This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES))
Error Message: The planned duration of the programme does not reach the required minimum duration for an apprenticeship standard

Rule Description:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2016 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2016-08-01) and on or prior to 31 July 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31) that are an apprenticeship standard (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 81 or 36 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), and a programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) and the learner has completed all learning activities (LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 2), then the minimum duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 365 days

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate < 365 days)

(This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES))
Error Message: The actual duration of the programme does not reach the required minimum duration for an apprenticeship standard

Rule Description:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2016 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2016-08-01), that are an apprenticeship (DD07 = Y), then they cannot start an apprenticeship until after the last Friday in June in the academic year (1 September to 31 August) in which they turn 16

(error where DD04 <= the last Friday in June in the academic year in which the learner turns 16)
Error Message: The learner is not over the school leaving age

Rule Description:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2016 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2016-08-01) and on or before 31 July 2017 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2017-07-31), and the learner is 24 or over at the start of the aim (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 24 years)  and the notional NVQ level of the aim is level 3 or above (LARS_NotionalNVQLevel_v2 = 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 or = H), then the Funding model must not be Adult skills

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35)

(This rule is not trigged by apprenticeships (DD07 = Y),
OLASS learners (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034),
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES),
Trade union aims (LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory.CategoryRef = 19), or
or by providers with an organisation type of Specialist Designated College (LearningProvider.UKPRN = Org_Details.UKPRN and LegalOrgType = USDC), 
Steel Industries Redundancy Training (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 347)
Error Message: The learning aim started on or after 1 August 2016 and the learner is 24 or over and the aim is Level 3 or above and the Funding model is Adult skills

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2017 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2017-08-01) and on or prior to 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31) and the learner is 24 or over at the start of the aim (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 24 years) and the notional NVQ level of the aim is level 3 or above (LARS_NotionalNVQLevel_v2 = 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 or = H), then the Funding model must not be Adult skills

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35)

(This rule is not trigged by apprenticeships (DD07 = Y),
OLASS learners (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034),
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES), 
or for A Levels (LARS_LearnAimRefType = '0002', '1413', '1430', '1431' and '1453'(where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef)) or Full funding for learners in devolved areas (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023))
Free Courses for Jobs Offer (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378)
Error Message: The learning aim started on or after 1 August 2017 and the learner is 24 or over and the aim is Level 3 or above and the Funding model is Adult skills

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01) and the learner is 24 or over at the start of the aim (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 24 years) and the notional NVQ level of the aim is level 3 or above (LARS_NotionalNVQLevel_v2 = 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 or = H), then the Funding model must not be Adult Skills Fund 

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38)

(This rule is not triggered by 
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES), 
or for A Levels (LARS_LearnAimRefType = '0002', '1413', '1430', '1431' and '1453'(where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef)) 
or 
Full funding for learners in devolved areas (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023)
or
Free Courses for Jobs Offer (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378)
or
Project S Pilot for Adult Skills Fund Providers (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 395)
Error Message: The learning aim started on or after 1 August 2024 and the learner is 24 or over and the aim is Level 3 or above and the Funding model is Adult Skills Fund

Rule Description:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2025-08-01), that are an apprenticeship standard (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), and a programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) and the learner has completed all learning activities (LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 2), then the duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 242 days

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate < 242 days)

(This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES))
Error Message: The actual duration of the programme does not reach the required minimum duration for an apprenticeship standard

Rule Description:
For new starts from 1st August 2025, if a funded foundation apprenticeship standard programme has been returned, the learner must not be 25 or over at the start of the learning aim.

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2025-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25
and
LearningDelivery.AimType = 1
and
LearningDelivery.StdCode = LARS_StandardCode
and
LARS_ApprenticeshipStandardTypeCode = A0001
and
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 25 years

(This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: The learner must not be 25 or over at the start of the learning  for a funded foundation apprenticeship standard programme

Rule Description:
For level 7 apprenticeship standard programmes starting on or after 1 January 2026, then the learner must be 16-21 at the start of the aim or be an apprentice care leaver and be under 25 years old at the start of the aim or have an 'Education health care plan' and be under 25 years old at the start of the aim.

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2026-01-01
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36
and 
LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25
and
LearningDelivery.AimType = 1
and
LearningDelivery.StdCode = LARS_StandardCode
and 
LARS_NotionalEndLevel = 7 
and
NOT (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth is between 16 and 21)
and
NOT (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 362 and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth < 25 years)
and
NOT (LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = EHC and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth < 25 years)


This rule is not triggered by:
Restarts (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: The learner is not able to be funded for a level 7 apprenticeship because they are either over 21 or are under 25 and are not an apprentice care leaver or have an EHC plan.

Rule Description:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2025-08-01), that are an apprenticeship standard (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), and a programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), and if the learner is 16 or over (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 16 year),  then the planned duration of the apprenticeship must be 242 days or more

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate < 242 days)

(This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES))
Error Message: The planned duration of the programme does not reach the required minimum duration for an apprenticeship standard

Rule Description:
If the learner's learning aim is 16-19 funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25), the GCSE English qualification grade must be returned

(error where Learner.EngGrade is unknown)
Error Message: The GCSE English qualification grade has not been returned

Rule Description:
If returned (Learner.EngGrade is known), the value must be a valid look up for a GCSE in Appendix Q

(error where Learner.EngGrade <> (the value of "NONE" or a valid GCSE grade in column_F of AppendixQAnnex1)
Error Message: The GCSE English qualification grade is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the GCSE English qualification grade is 'D' or below or grade 3 or below (Learner.EngGrade = D, DD, DE, E, EE, EF, F, FF, FG, G, GG, N, U,3, 2 or 1) then a Learner FAM type of 'Eligibility for EFA disadvantage funding' must be returned

(error where  there is no LearnerFAM record where Learner.LearnFAMType = EDF and Learner.LearnFAMCode = 2)
Error Message: The Learner FAM Type of Eligibility for EFA disadvantage funding must be returned

Rule Description:
If the Learner is exempt from or has met the English condition of funding (Learner.LearnFAMType = ECF and Learner.LearnFAMCode = 2, 3 or 4), then the GCSE English qualification grade must be "NONE"

(error where Learner.EngGrade <> "NONE")
Error Message: GCSE English qualification grade must be 'NONE'

Rule Description:
The learner's Ethnicity must be a valid lookup

(error where Learner.Ethnicity <> valid lookup on ILR_Ethnicity)
Error Message: The Ethnicity is not a valid code

Rule Description:
The learner's Family name must be returned.  

(error where Learner.FamilyName is unknown or contains all whitespace)

This rule is not triggered by community learning aims (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10) or (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and  (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 108)).
Error Message: The learner's Family name must be returned

Rule Description:
If all aims are community learning funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 108)) OR (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10), and the Planned learning hours are greater than 10 (Learner.PlanLearnHours > 10), the Family name must be returned 

(error where Learner.FamilyName is unknown or contains all whitespace)
Error Message: The learner's Family name must be returned

Rule Description:
If all aims are community learning funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 108)) OR (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10), and the Planned learning hours are 10 or less (Learner.PlanLearnHours <= 10), and the Unique learner number has been returned (Learner.ULN <> 9999999999), the Family name must be returned 

(error where Learner.FamilyName is unknown or contains all whitespace)
Error Message: The learner's Family name must be returned

Rule Description:
The learner's Given names must be returned

(error where Learner.GivenNames is unknown or contains all whitespace)

This rule is not triggered by community learning aims (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10) or (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and  (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 108)).
Error Message: The learner's Given names must be returned

Rule Description:
If all aims are community learning funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 108)) OR (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10), and the Planned learning hours are greater than 10 (Learner.PlanLearnHours > 10), the Given name must be returned 

(error where Learner.GivenNames is unknown or contains all whitespace)
Error Message: The learner's Given names must be returned

Rule Description:
If all aims are community learning funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 108)) OR (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10), and the Planned learning hours are 10 or less (Learner.PlanLearnHours <= 10), and the Unique learner number has been returned (Learner.ULN <> 9999999999), the Given name must be returned 

(error where Learner.GivenNames is unknown or contains all whitespace)
Error Message: The learner's Given names must be returned

Rule Description:
If a FAM type is returned (LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType is known), the FAM code must be a valid lookup for that FAM type

(error where LearnerFAM.LearnFAMCode <> valid lookup on ILR_FAMTypeFAMCode)
Error Message: The FAM type and code is not valid

Rule Description:
The earliest Learning start date must not be after the 'Valid to' date for this FAMType and FAMCode

(error where DD06 > 'Valid to' in ILR_FAMTypeCode)
Error Message: The FAM type and code is not valid for this Learning start date

Rule Description:
If the FAM type is HNS, EHC, DLA, SEN, MCF, ECF, FME, MMH or EMH  there must only be one occurrence

(error where LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = HNS, EHC, DLA, SEN, MCF, ECF, FME, MMH or EMH and occurrence > 1)
Error Message: There must not be more than one record with a FAM type of HNS, EHC, DLA, SEN, MCF, ECF, FME, MMH or EMH

Rule Description:
If the FAM type is LSR there must be no more than four occurrences

(error where LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType =  LSR and occurrences > 4)
Error Message: There must not be more than four records with a FAM type of LSR

Rule Description:
If the FAM type is NLM or EDF there must be no more than two occurrences

(error where LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = NLM or EDF and occurrences > 2)
Error Message: There must not be more than two records with a FAM type of EDF or NLM

Rule Description:
If a Learner FAM Type of Special Educational Needs (SEN) is recorded (LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = SEN and LearnerFAM.LearnFAMCode = 1), the learner must not have a record of FAM type EHC as well

(error where there is also a record of (LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = EHC and LearnerFAM.LearnFAMCode = 1)
Error Message: The learner must not have both a FAM type of SEN and EHC

Rule Description:
If the learner is exempt from maths GCSE condition of funding due to learning difficulties or disabilities (LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = MCF and LearnerFAM.LearnFAMCode = 1), they must have an Education health care plan (EHC plan)

(error where LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType <> (EHC))
Error Message: The learner is recorded as exempt from maths GCSE condition of funding due to a learning difficulty but there is no Education health care plan recorded

Rule Description:
If the learner is exempt from English GCSE condition of funding due to learning difficulties or disabilities (LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = ECF and LearnerFAM.LearnFAMCode = 1), they must have an Education health care plan (EHC plan)

(error where LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType <> (EHC))
Error Message: The learner is recorded as exempt from English GCSE condition of funding due to a learning difficulty but there is no Education health care plan recorded

Rule Description:
Where the Learner Funding and Monitoring type  of National learner monitoring (NLM) and Learner repeating up to one full final year of 16-19 funded provision (LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = NLM and LearnerFAM.LearnFAMCode = 22) then Learner in receipt of 16-19 tuition fund (LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = NLM and LearnerFAM.LearnFAMCode = 21) must not be returned for the same learner 

error where there is a record of LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = NLM and LearnerFAM.LearnFAMCode = 22 and there is a record of LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType = NLM and LearnerFAM.LearnFAMCode = 21 for the same learner
Error Message: NLM22 and NLM21 cannot be recorded for the same learner

Rule Description:
If a LLDD and health problem category is returned (LLDDandHealthProblem.LLDDCat is known), it must be a valid lookup

(error where LLDDandHealthProblem.LLDDCat <> valid lookup on ILR_LLDDCat)
Error Message: The LLDD and health problem category is not a valid code

Rule Description:
The earliest Learning start date must not be after the 'Valid to' date for this LLDD category.

(error where DD06 > 'Valid to' in ILR_LLDDCat)
Error Message: The LLDD and health problem category is not valid for this start date

Rule Description:
The learner's LLDD and health problem must be a valid lookup


(error where Learner.LLDDHealthProb <> valid lookup on ILR_LLDDHealthProb)
Error Message: The LLDD and health problem is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the learner's LLDD and health problem is 'Learner does not consider himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem' (Learner.LLDDHealthProb = 2), then a LLDD and Health Problem record must not be returned

(error where the  LLDDandHealthProblem record is known)
Error Message: The LLDD and Health Problem record has been returned and the learner does not consider himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem

Rule Description:
If the LLDD and health problem is 'Learner considers himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem (Learner.LLDDHealthProb = 1)', then a LLDD and Health Problem record must be returned

(error where there is no record of LLDDandHealthProblem)

This rule is not triggered by community learning aims ((LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10) or (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 108))
or by learners aged 25 or over at start ((DD06 - Learner.DateOfBirth) >= 25 years)
Error Message: The LLDD and Health Problem record has not been returned and the learner does consider himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem

Rule Description:
If the LLDD and health problem is 'Learner considers himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem' (Learner.LLDDHealthProb = 1), and all aims are community learning funded ((LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10) or (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 108)), and the planned learner hours are greater than 10 (Learner.PlanLearnHours > 10),  then a LLDD and Health Problem record must be returned

(error where there is no record of LLDDandHealthProblem)

(This rule is not triggered by learners aged 25 or over at start ((DD06 - Learner.DateOfBirth) >= 25 years))
Error Message: The LLDD and Health Problem record has not been returned and the learner does consider himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem

Rule Description:
If the learner's learning aim is 16-19 funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25), the GCSE maths qualification grade must be returned

(error where Learner.MathGrade is unknown)
Error Message: The GCSE maths qualification grade has not been returned

Rule Description:
If returned (Learner.MathGrade is known), the value must be a valid look up for a GCSE in Appendix Q

(error where Learner.MathGrade <> (the value of "NONE" or a valid GCSE grade in column_F of AppendixQAnnex1)
Error Message: The GCSE maths qualification grade is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the GCSE maths qualification grade is 'D' or below or grade '3' or below (Learner.MathGrade = D, DD, DE, E, EE, EF, F, FF, FG, G, GG, N, U, 3, 2 or 1), then a Learner FAM type of 'Eligibility for EFA disadvantage funding' must be returned

(error where there is no LearnerFAM record where Learner.LearnFAMType = EDF and Learner.LearnFAMCode = 1)
Error Message: The Learner FAM Type of Eligibility for EFA disadvantage funding must be returned

Rule Description:
If the Learner is exempt from or has met the Maths condition of funding (Learner.LearnFAMType = MCF and Learner.LearnFAMCode = 2, 3 or 4), then the GCSE maths qualification grade must be "NONE"

(error where  Learner.MathGrade <> "NONE")
Error Message: GCSE maths qualification grade must be 'NONE'

Rule Description:
If the NI Number is returned (Learner.NINumber is known), the first character must not be D, F, I, Q, U or V and the second character must not be D, F, I, O, Q, U or V and characters 3 to 8 must be numeric and character 9 must be A, B, C, D or space

error where the above checksum is invalid)
Error Message: The National Insurance number is not in the correct format

Rule Description:
If the learner is on an apprenticeship funded through a contract for services with the employer (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 1), then the NI number must be returned.

(error where Learner.NINumber is  unknown)
Error Message: The National Insurance number must be returned for this learner

Rule Description:
If the learner's learning in 16-19 funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25), the Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours, must be returned

(error where Learner.PlanEEPHours is unknown)

This rule is not triggered by apprenticeships (DD07 = Y), 
or when all learning aims are closed (Learningdelivery.LearnActEndDate is known)
or T Level programmes (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31)
Error Message: The Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours have not been returned

Rule Description:
The Planned learning hours must be returned 

(error where Learner.PlanLearnHours is unknown)

(This rule is not triggered by apprenticeships (DD07 = Y) 
or when all learning aims are closed (Learningdelivery.LearnActEndDate is known) or Other 16-19 provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 82)
or T Level programmes (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31)
Error Message: The Planned learning hours have not been returned

Rule Description:
If returned, the Planned learning hours should be greater than zero 

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 35, 38, 37, 81, 10  or 99 and Learner.PlanLearnHours = 0)

This rule is not triggered by T Level programmes (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31)
Error Message: The Planned learning hours should not be zero

Rule Description:
If returned (Learner.PlanLearnHours is known) and the learner's learning aim is 16-19 funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25), the sum of the Planned learning hours and the Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours must be greater than zero

(error where Learner.PlanLearnHours  + Learner.PlanEEPHours = 0)

This rule is not triggered by Other 16-19 provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 82)
or T Level programmes (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31)
Error Message: The sum of the Planned learning hours and the Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours must not be zero

Rule Description:
If returned, the sum of the Planned learning hours and the Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours should not be greater than 1000 hours

(error where Learner.PlanLearnHours  + Learner.PlanEEPHours > 1000)

This rule is not triggered by Other 16-19 provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 82)
or T Level programmes (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31)
Error Message: The sum of the Planned learning hours and the Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours should not be greater than 1,000 hours

Rule Description:
If returned (Learner.PlanLearnHours is known), the sum of the Planned learning hours and the Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours must not be greater than 4000 hours

(error where Learner.PlanLearnHours  + Learner.PlanEEPHours > 4000)

This rule is not triggered by Other 16-19 provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 82)
or T Level programmes (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31)
Error Message: The sum of the Planned learning hours and the Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours must not be greater than 4,000 hours

Rule Description:
If returned, the Pre-merger UKPRN (Learner.PMUKPRN is known) must be a valid lookup on the UKPRN table.

(error where <> valid lookup on the Org_PartnerUKPRN table)
Error Message: The UKPRN is not valid

Rule Description:
The Postcode should be a valid postcode on the list of complete UK postcodes table or be ZZ99 9ZZ

(error where Learner.Postcode <> (a valid lookup on Postcodes.PostcodeValidity or  ZZ99 9ZZ)
Error Message: The Postcode is not valid

Rule Description:
The Postcode must conform to the valid postcode format

(error where the first part of Learner.Postcode <> valid format of 1 or 2 capital letters followed by (1 or 2 numbers or 1 number and a capital letter) and the second part of the postcode <> valid format of (nXX) where n = 0-9 and XX are capital letters excluding C, I, K, M, O and V)
Error Message: The Postcode is not in the correct format

Rule Description:
The Postcode prior to enrolment should be a valid postcode on the list of complete UK postcodes table or be ZZ99 9ZZ

(error where Learner.PostcodePrior <> (a valid lookup on Postcodes.PostcodeValidity or  ZZ99 9ZZ)
Error Message: The Postcode prior to enrolment is not valid

Rule Description:
The Postcode prior to enrolment must conform to the valid postcode format

(error where the first part of  Learner.PostcodePrior  <> valid format of 1 or 2 capital letters followed by (1 or 2 numbers or 1 number and a capital letter) and the second part of the postcode <> valid format of (nXX) where n = 0-9 and XX are capital letters excluding C, I, K, M, O and V)
Error Message: The Postcode prior to enrolment is not in the correct format

Rule Description:
If returned,  the UKPRN in previous year (Learner.PrevUKPRN is known) must be a valid lookup on the UKPRN table

(error where <> valid lookup on the Org_PartnerUKPRN table)
Error Message: The UKPRN is not valid

Rule Description:
If the earliest Learning start date is on or after 1 August 2015 (DD06 >= 2015-08-01) hen the Primary LLDD and health problem must be recorded on one of the LLDD and health problem records

(error where there is no record of LLDDandHealthProblem where PrimaryLLDD = 1)
Error Message: The Primary LLDD and health problem is not recorded on one of the LLDD and health problem records

Rule Description:
If the PrimaryLLDD and health problem is returned (LLDDandHealthProblem.PrimaryLLDD is known), it must be a valid look up

(error where LLDDandHealthProblem.PrimaryLLDD <> valid look up on ILR_PrimaryLLDD)
Error Message: The Primary LLDD and health problem is not a valid code

Rule Description:
There must not be more than one LLDD and health problem record with a Primary LLDD and health problem

(error where there is more than one occurrence of LLDDandHealthProblem record where LLDDandHealthProblem.PrimaryLLDD = 1)
Error Message: There must only be one Primary LLDD and Health problem record

Rule Description:
If there is only one LLDD and Health problem record (there is one occurrence of LLDDandHealthProblem record) then the Primary LLDD and health problem must be recorded

(error where  LLDDandHealthProblem.PrimaryLLDD is unknown)
Error Message: The Primary LLDD and health problem is not recorded

Rule Description:
The Prior attainment entity must be returned

(error where PriorAttain.PriorLevel is unknown)

This rule is not triggered by community learning aims ((LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10) or (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 108)), or for 16-19 funded learners (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 or 82)" or Tailored learining funded learners (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 11)
Error Message: The Prior attainment has not been returned

Rule Description:
If returned (PriorAttain.PriorLevel is known), the Prior Level must be a valid lookup 

(error where  PriorAttain.PriorLevel <> valid lookup on ILR_PriorAttain)
Error Message: The Prior attainment is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the prior attainment level is level 4 or above (PriorAttain.PriorLevel = 7, 8, 9, 10,  and the learner is adult skills funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35), then the learner must not be on an Adult skills funded intermediate, advanced, or higher level 4 apprenticeship

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 2, 3 or 20)
Error Message: The Prior attainment is not valid if the programme is a funded intermediate or advanced level apprenticeship

Rule Description:
If returned, the Prior attainment date level  Applies (priorattain.datelevelapp. is known) must not be after the file preparation date 

(error where priorattain.datelevelapp is > file preparation date)
Error Message: The prior attainment date level applies  is after the file preparation date

Rule Description:
A learner must not have more than one prior attainment record with the same Date and level.

(error where there is more than one record for the learner with the same PriorAttain.DateLevelApp)
Error Message: A learner must not have more than one prior attainment record on the same date

Rule Description:
If Provider specified learner monitoring is returned (ProviderSpecLearnerMonitoring.ProvSpecLearnMonOccur is known), occurrence must be 'A' or 'B'

(error where ProviderSpecLearnerMonitoring.ProvSpecLearnMonOccur <> 'A' or 'B')
Error Message: The Provider specified learner monitoring occurrence is not 'A' or 'B'

Rule Description:
The learner's Sex must be a valid lookup

(error where Learner.Sex <> valid lookup on ILR_Sex)
Error Message: The Sex is not a valid code

Rule Description:
The UKPRN must be the same as the Header

(error where LearningProvider.UKPRN <> UKPRN in Header)
Error Message: The UKPRN is not the same as recorded in the Header

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is Adult skills funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35) there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = ASFC-ASCL2526, STFIG2526, ASFC-FCFJ2526)

(this rule is not triggered by 
apprenticeships (DD07 = Y),
(LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 357, 
'OLASS - Offender in Custody (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034'), 
where the LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is known and in the previous teaching year,
Devolved authorities (DD35 =Y),
19-24 Traineeships - 2020 procurement (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 377),
Procured Adult Education Budget 2021 (AEB) (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 379)
Procured Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB) (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 388)
Error Message: There is no Adult skills funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learner is in receipt of Advanced Learner Loans Bursary funding (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ALB), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT for this LearningProvider.UKPRN where ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = ALLB2526, ALLBC2526 )

(This rule is not triggered where the
LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is known and in the previous teaching year)
Error Message: There is no Advanced Learner Loans Bursary funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is a apprenticeship (DD07 = Y), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = APPS2526)

(this rule is not triggered on OLASS learning aims (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034), or apprenticeship levy funded aims (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36), or when LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not null and in the previous teaching year, or 
the aim is a Non-apprenticeship Sporting Excellence Award (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 353), or
or Non-apprenticeship Sea Fishing (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 355), or 
a non funded learning aim (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99).
Error Message: There is no apprenticeship funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is an apprenticeship (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 1) and (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36) started on or after 1 May 2017 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2017-05-01), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = LEVY1799 or NONLEVY2019)

(This rule is not triggered when LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not null and in the previous teaching year)
Error Message: There is no apprenticeship funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is a non-levy apprenticeship (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 2) and (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36), started on or after 1 May 2017 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2017-05-01), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = APPS2526, 16-18NLAP2018 or ANLAP2018)


(This rule is not triggered when LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not null and in the previous teaching year)
Error Message: There is no apprenticeship funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim starting on or after 1st November 2017 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2017-11-01) and is identified as procured Adult Education Budget (AEB) (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 357), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = AEB-19TRN2021, AEB-AS2021, STFI2021)

(This rule is not triggered when LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not null and in the previous teaching year)
Error Message: There is no Adult skills funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim starting on or after 1st January 2018 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2018-01-01) and is identified as procured non levy apprenticeships (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 2) and
(LearningDelivery.AimType = 1)  there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = 16-18NLAP2018, ANLAP2018)

(this rule is not triggered by LDM 358 (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 358)
and by restarts (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = RES and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 1), or (when LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not null and in the previous teaching year))
Error Message: There is no apprenticeship funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is identified as non procured non levy apprenticeships (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 358) and
(LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 2), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = APPS2526)

(This rule is not triggered when LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not null and in the previous teaching year)
Error Message: There is no apprenticeship funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is identified as non procured non levy apprenticeships (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 358) and
(LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 2), there must not be a funding relationship in FCT for a procured non levy contract (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = 16-18NLAP2018 or ANLAP2018)

(This rule is not triggered when LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not null and in the previous teaching year)
Error Message: There is no apprenticeship funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is identified as procured non levy (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 2) and (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) and (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36)  there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN and ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = 16-18NLAP2018, ANLAP2018), it cannot be started on or after the Stop New Starts date of the latest contract start date in FCT (ContractAllocation.StartDate)

(error where ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate is not null and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate of the latest ContractAllocation.StartDate in FCT) 

(This rule is not triggered by Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: This learning aim cannot be started after the Stop New Starts date for this funding relationship

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is identified as Agency funded adult skills (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 105) where there is a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN and where ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = ASFC-ASCL2526, STFIG2526, ASFC-FCFJ2526 ), it cannot be started on or after the Stop New Starts date of the latest contract start date in FCT (ContractAllocation.StartDate)

(error where ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate is not null and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate of the latest ContractAllocation.StartDate in FCT)

(This rule is not triggered by Procured Adult Education Budget (AEB)
LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 357,
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: This learning aim cannot be started after the Stop New Starts date for this funding relationship

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is identified as procured Adult Education Budget (AEB) ((LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 105) and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 357) and where there is a funding relationship in FCT for this LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN and where ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = AEB-19TRN2021, AEB-AS2021) , it cannot be started on or after the Stop New Starts date of the latest contract start date in FCT (ContractAllocation.StartDate)


(error where ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate is not null and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate of the latest ContractAllocation.StartDate in FCT)


(This rule is not triggered by Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: This learning aim cannot be started after the Stop New Starts date for this funding relationship

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is identified as an on-service ("levy") apprenticeship (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 1) and (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) and (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36)  there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN and ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = LEVY1799, NONLEVY2019), it cannot be started on or after the Stop New Starts date of the latest contract start date in FCT (ContractAllocation.StartDate)

(error where ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate is not null and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate of the latest ContractAllocation.StartDate in FCT) 

(This rule is not triggered by Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = RES)
Error Message: This learning aim cannot be started after the Stop New Starts date for this funding relationship

Rule Description:
If the learning aim starting on or after 1st August 2021 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2021-08-01) and is identified as procured Adult Education Budget 2021 (AEB), (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 379) and the learning aim is Adult skills funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 105) there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = AEB-AS2324, AEB-NSF2324)

(This rule is not triggered when LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not null and in the previous teaching year)
Error Message: There is no Adult skills funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is identified as procured Adult Education Budget 2021 (AEB), (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 379) and the learning aim is Adult skills funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 105) and there is a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN and ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = AEB-AS2324, AEB-NSF2324), it cannot be started on or after the Stop New Starts date of the latest contract start date in FCT (ContractAllocation.StartDate)

(error where ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate is not null and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate of the latest ContractAllocation.StartDate in FCT) 

(This rule is not triggered by Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = RES)
Error Message: This learning aim cannot be started after the Stop New Starts date for this funding relationship

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is identified as Skills Bootcamps (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32) there must be either a funding relationship, a valid contract reference number and deliverable code in FCT for this UKPRN  or a matching Contract Reference Number in the Skills Bootcamps Contracts database. 

error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
and
((there is no matching record in FCS where
LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN
and
ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = SB2022 ,SB-PAA2022 or SB2023
and 
the first part of LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber (up to the second hyphen) matches a ContractAllocation.ContractAllocationNumber)
and 
the second part of LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber (after the second hyphen) matches a ContractDeliverable.DeliverableCode for the contract allocation)
or
there is no matching record in Skills Bootcamp Contract database where
LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber = SkillsBootcampContracts.ILRContractRefNumber)
Error Message: There is no Skills Bootcamp funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim starting on or after 1st August 2023 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2023-08-01) and is identified as procured Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB), (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 388) and the learning aim is Adult skills funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 or 38 and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 105) there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = ASF2023-AS2526, ASF2023-FCFJ2526, ASF2023-STFI2526)

(This rule is not triggered when LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not null and in the previous teaching year)
Error Message: There is no Adult skills funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is identified as procured Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB), (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 388) and the learning aim is Adult skills funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 or 38 and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 105) and there is a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN and ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = ASF2023-AS2526, ASF2023-FCFJ2526, ASF2023-STFI2526), it cannot be started on or after the Stop New Starts date of the latest contract start date in FCT (ContractAllocation.StartDate)

(error where ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate is not null and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate of the latest ContractAllocation.StartDate in FCT) 

(This rule is not triggered by Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = RES)
Error Message: This learning aim cannot be started after the Stop New Starts date for this funding relationship

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is Adult Skills Fund funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38) there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = ASFC-ASCL2526, STFIG2526, ASFC-FCFJ2526)

(this rule is not triggered by 

where the LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is known and in the previous teaching year,
or
Devolved authorities (DD35 =Y)
or
Procured Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB) (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 388)
Error Message: There is no Adult Skills Fund funding relationship for this UKPRN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is identified as Adult Skills Fund (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 105) where there is a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN and where ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = ASFC-ASCL2526, STFIG2526, ASFC-FCFJ2526, it cannot be started on or after the Stop New Starts date of the latest contract start date in FCT (ContractAllocation.StartDate)

(error where ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate is not null and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate of the latest ContractAllocation.StartDate in FCT)

(This rule is not triggered by 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES
or
Procured Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB) (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 388)
Error Message: This learning aim cannot be started after the Stop New Starts date for this funding relationship

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is non-funded, community learning funded or Tailored Learning Funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99, 10, 11), the ULN should not be the default value

(error where Learner.ULN = 9999999999)

(This rule is not triggered for Office for Students (OfS) funded aims (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1))
Error Message: This Unique learner number should not be used

Rule Description:
For all learning, if the file preparation date is before 1 january of the current teaching year, the unique learner number (Learner.ULN) should not be the default value

(error where Learner.ULN = 9999999999)

(This rule is not triggered where (LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearnDelFAMCode = 1))
Error Message: This Unique learner number should not be used

Rule Description:
The Unique learner number (Learner.ULN), must pass the checksum calculation

(error where DD01 = 'N' or (DD01 <> 'Y' and DD01 <> 10th digit of Learner.ULN))
Error Message: The Unique learner number does not pass the checksum calculation

Rule Description:
The Unique learner number (Learner.ULN), must be a valid lookup on the Learner Register table

(error where Learner.ULN <> a valid lookup on the Learner Register table

(This rule is not triggered where  Learner.ULN = 9999999999)
Error Message: The Unique learner number is not valid

Rule Description:
If the file preparation date is on or after 1 January of the current teaching year (file preparation date >= 1 January of the current teaching year), and is a funded aim (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82, 35, 37, 38 36, 81 or (99 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ADL and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1)), and the planned or actual duration on or greater than 5 days  (LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 5 or LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 5), and the Learning start date on or less than 60 days before the file preparation date file preparation date - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 60 days) the Unique learner number (ULN) should not be 9999999999

(Error where Learner.ULN = 9999999999)

(This rule is not triggered on OLASS learning aims (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034), or for levy funded apprenticeships (LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearnDelFAMCode = 1))
Error Message: This Unique learner number should not be used

Rule Description:
If the file preparation date is on or after 1 January of the current teaching year (file preparation date >= 1 January), and the aim is agency funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82, 35, 37,38, 36, 81 or (99 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ADL and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1)), and the aim has a planned  or actual duration of >= 5 days and the Learning start date is > 60 days before the file preparation date ((LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 5 OR LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 5) and file preparation date - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 60 days), the Unique learner number (ULN) must not be 9999999999

(Error where Learner.ULN = 9999999999)


(This rule is not triggered on OLASS learning aims (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034), or for levy funded apprenticeships (LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearnDelFAMCode = 1))
Error Message: This Unique learner number must not be used

Rule Description:
If the file preparation date is on or after 1 January of the current teaching year (file preparation date >= 1 January of the current teaching year), and the learner is an 'OLASS - Offender in Custody' (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType =  LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034), the Unique learner number (ULN) should not be 999999999

(error where Learner.ULN = 9999999999)
Error Message: This Unique learner number should not be used

Rule Description:
If the file preparation date is on or after 1 January of the current teaching year (file preparation date >= 1 January), and the aim is Office for Students (OfS) funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1), and the aim has a planned  or actual duration of >= 5 days and the Learning start date is <= 60 days before the file preparation date ((LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 5 OR LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 5) and file preparation date - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 60 days), the Unique learner number (ULN) should not be 999999999

(Error where Learner.ULN = 9999999999)

(This rule is not triggered on OLASS learning aims (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034)
Error Message: This Unique learner number should not be used

Rule Description:
If the file preparation date is on or after 1 January of the current teaching year (file preparation date >= 1 January), and the aim is  Office for Students (OfS) funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1)), and the aim has a planned  or actual duration of >= 5 days and the Learning start date is > 60 days before the file preparation date ((LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 5 OR LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 5) and file preparation date - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 60 days), the Unique learner number (ULN) must not be 999999999

(Error where Learner.ULN = 9999999999)

(This rule is not triggered on OLASS learning aims (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034)
Error Message: This Unique learner number must not be used

Rule Description:
If the learner is on an apprenticeship funded through a contract for services with the employer (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode = 1), then the Unique learner number (ULN) must not be 9999999999

(Error where Learner.ULN = 9999999999)
Error Message: This Unique learner number must not be used

Rule Description:
If returned, the Achievement date (LearningDelivery.AchDate is known) should be before the current teaching year end date

(error where LearningDelivery.AchDate > current teaching year end date)
Error Message: The Achievement date should not be after the current teaching year end date

Rule Description:
If returned, the Achievement date (LearningDelivery.AchDate is known) must not be before the Learning start date

(error where LearningDelivery.AchDate < LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)

This rule is not triggered by skills bootcamps (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32)
Error Message: The Achievement date must not be before the Learning start date

Rule Description:
If the Achievement date (LearningDelivery.AchDate is known) is returned, the Learning actual end date must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is unknown)

This rule is not triggered by skills bootcamps (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32)
Error Message: The Learning actual end date must be returned for this Achievement date

Rule Description:
If returned, the Achievement date (LearningDelivery.AchDate is known) must be on or after the Learning actual end date

(error where LearningDelivery.AchDate < LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate)

This rule is not triggered by skills bootcamps (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32)
Error Message: The Achievement date must be after the Learning actual end date

Rule Description:
If returned, the Achievement date (LearningDelivery.AchDate is known) must not be after the file preparation date

(error where LearningDelivery.AchDate  > file preparation date)
Error Message: The Achievement date must be before the file preparation date

Rule Description:
For programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), that are funded via trailblazer apprenticeship standards (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 81 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25) that have an outcome of achieved (LearningDelivery.Outcome = 1), the acheivement date must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.AchDate is unknown)
Error Message: The Achievement date must be completed for apprenticeship standards and traineeship programmes with a status of achieved

Rule Description:
For learning aims that started after 31 July 2015 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 2015-07-31),  the Achievement date must not be completed 

(error where LearningDelivery.AchDate is known)

This rule is not triggered by
trailblazer apprenticeship standard programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and 
(LearningDelivery.FundModel = 81 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25) or (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25)
)
or
Skills Bootcamps  (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32)
Error Message: The Achievement date must not be completed for aims that are not traineeship or apprenticeship standard programme aims

Rule Description:
For programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) that are funded via apprenticeship standards (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25) that ended on or after 1 August 2021 (LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate >= 2021-08-01), where Completion status is 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim' (LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 2) the Achievement date must be returned (LearningDelivery.AchDate) 
 
(error where LearningDelivery.AimType = 1
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25
and 
LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate >= 2021-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.CompStat = 2 
and 
LearningDelivery.AchDate is not returned)
Error Message: The Achievement date must be returned

Rule Description:
For programme aims that are funded via Skills Bootcamps, the Achievement date can't be later than six months after the Learning actual end date.

error where LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 
and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32
and (LearningDelivery.AchDate - LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate) >  6 months
Error Message: The Achievement date can't be later than six months after the Learning actual end date for Skills Bootcamp programmes

Rule Description:
The Additional delivery hours must only be recorded for Adult Skills, Apprenticeships or Other Adult learning aims (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35, 36, 38 or 81), with a Learning start date on or after 1 August 2015 

(error where LearningDelivery.AddHours is known and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2015-08-01)
Error Message: The Additional delivery hours must not be returned for learning aims that started prior to 1 August 2015

Rule Description:
For Community Learning, 16-19, Other 16-19, Skills Bootcamps  or Non-funded provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82, 10, 37 or 99), the Additional delivery hours must not be recorded 

(error where LearningDelivery.AddHours is known)
Error Message: The Additional delivery hours must not be returned for EFA, Community Learning or Non-funded provision

Rule Description:
Where the Additional delivery hours have been returned (LearningDelivery.AddHours is known), they must only be recorded for ESOL qualification or unit aims

(error where LARS_BasicSkillsType_Lookup <> 36, 37, 38, 39, 40, 41, or 42 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))
Error Message: The Additional delivery hours must only be returned for ESOL qualification or unit aims

Rule Description:
If the Additional delivery hours are greater than 60, then the average number of additional hours per day must not be greater than 24

(error where LearningDelivery.AddHours > 60 and LearningDelivery.AddHours / (LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate + 1) NOT<= 24)
Error Message: The Additional delivery hours must not exceed 24 hours in a day

Rule Description:
If the Additional delivery hours are greater than 60, then the average number of additional hours per week should not be greater than 35

(error where LearningDelivery.AddHours > 60 and  (LearningDelivery.AddHours / ((LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate + 1) / 7)) NOT <= 35)
Error Message: The Additional delivery hours should not exceed 35 hours in a week

Rule Description:
