The average number of Additional delivery hours per day should not be greater than 9 and less than 24 

(error where LearningDelivery.AddHours / (LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate + 1) > 9 AND LearningDelivery.AddHours / (LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate + 1) < 24)
Error Message: The Additional delivery hours divided by the number of days of study is greater than 9 and less than 24

Rule Description:
If returned, the apprenticeship financial record date (AppFinRecord.AFinDate is known) must not be after the file preparation date 

(error where AppFinRecord.AFinDate is > file preparation date)
Error Message: The apprenticeship financial record date must not be after the file preparation date

Rule Description:
If a residual training price has been returned for this aim (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 3), there must not be a total training price returned (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 1) with a later date

(error where AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 1) > AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 3))
Error Message: A total training price must not be returned after a residual training price has been recorded

Rule Description:
If a residual assessment price has been returned for this aim (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 4), there must not be a total assessment price returned (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 2) with a later date

(error where AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 2) > AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 4))
Error Message: A total assessment price must not be returned after a residual assessment price has been recorded

Rule Description:
If a total training price has been returned for this aim (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 1), there must not be a residual training price returned (AppFinRecord.AFinType  = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode  = 3) on the same date

(error where AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 1) = AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 3))
Error Message: A total training price and residual training price record must not have the same financial date

Rule Description:
If a total assessment price has been returned for this aim (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 2), there must not be a residual assessment price returned (AppFinRecord.AFinType  = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode  = 4) on the same date

(error where AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 2) = AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 4))
Error Message: A total assessment price and residual assessment price record must not have the same financial date

Rule Description:
The apprenticeship financial record date must not be more than one year before the Learning start date of the apprenticeship standard or framework programme (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 2, 3, 20, 21, 22, 23, 25) 

(error where  AppFinRecord.AFinDate > 1 year before  LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: The apprenticeship financial record date must not be more than one year before the start of the apprenticeship programme

Rule Description:
The apprenticeship financial record date must not be more than two years after the Learning actual end date of the apprenticeship standard or framework programme (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 2, 3, 20, 21, 22, 23, 25)

(error where AppFinRecord.AFinDate > 2 years after  LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate)
Error Message: The apprenticeship financial record date should not be more than two years after the Learning actual end date of the apprenticeship programme

Rule Description:
For the apprenticeship standard programme, the apprenticeship financial record date for a price record must not be after the achievement date or must not be after the learning actual end date where the learner has withdrawn.

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25 and LearningDelivery.AchDate is returned and AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinDate > LearningDelivery.AchDate) or (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25  and LearningDelivery.AchDate is not returned and LearningDelivery.WithdrawReason is returned and AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinDate > LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate)
Error Message: The price must not be after the achievement date

Rule Description:
If a Payment record date has been returned (AppFinRecord.AFinType = PMR and AppFinRecord.AFinDate is returned), the Payment record date must not be after the file preparation date.

error where:
there is a record of AppFinRecord.AFinDate where AppFinRecord.AFinType = PMR
and
AppFinRecord.AFinDate is > file preparation date
Error Message: The Payment (PMR) record must not be after the file preparation date

Rule Description:
If the programme aim is part of a trailblazer apprenticeship standard (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 81, LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25) and AimType = 1), then a Apprenticeship Financial Record of TNP1 must be returned

(error where there is no record of AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 1)
Error Message: An apprenticeship Financial Record for the Total training price must be returned

Rule Description:
If a  financial type is returned (AppFinRecord.AFinType is known), then the financial code must be a valid lookup for that financial type

(error where AppFinRecord.AFinCode <> valid lookup on ILR_AppFinRecordAFinTypeAFinCode)
Error Message: The financial type and code is not valid

Rule Description:
The Apprenticeship Financial Record must not be returned (the Apprenticeship Financial Record is unknown) if the aim is not an apprenticeship standard programme aim or apprenticeship funded programme aim

(error where  (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 81, LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) or (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1)
Error Message: The Apprenticeship Financial Record must not be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If an assessment payment is recorded (AppFinRecord.AFinType = PMR and AppFinRecord.AFinCode  = 2) for an apprenticeship standard programme (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), then there must be an assessment price record

(error where there is no record where AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 2 or 4)
Error Message: A financial record for the total assessment price must be returned

Rule Description:
If the financial record is a residual price record (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode= 3 or 4), then the funding model must be 36

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 36)
Error Message: This Financial code must not be used for this funding model

Rule Description:
If the programme is an apprenticeship standard (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), then an end point assessment price should be recorded

(error where there is no record where (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 2 or 4)

(This rule is not triggered by non-funded apprenticeship standards (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25)
Error Message: The end-point assessment price should be returned

Rule Description:
If the programme is apprenticeship funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and AimType = 1), there must be a price record

(error where there is no record where AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP)
Error Message: The price must be returned for this programme

Rule Description:
An apprenticeship funded programme (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) must have a price record that applies from the start date of the programme. 

(error where there is no record where (AppFinRecord.AFinDate where AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP) = LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: There must be a price record that applies from the start of the programme

Rule Description:
If a training payment is recorded, then there must be a training price record  (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and AppFinRecord.AFinType = PMR and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 1)

(error where there is no record where AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 1 or 3)
Error Message: A financial record for the training price must be returned

Rule Description:
The Aim sequence number must not be greater than the count of learning aims

(error where LearningDelivery.AimSeqNumber > count of aims)
Error Message: The Aim sequence number is greater than the count of the learning aims

Rule Description:
The Aim type must be a valid lookup 
(error where LearningDelivery.AimType <> valid lookup on ILR_AimType)
Error Message: The Aim type is not a valid code

Rule Description:
The 'Core aim' is only valid for 16-19 non apprenticeship provision

(error where LearningDelivery.AimType = 5 and  LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 25 or 82)
Error Message: The Aim type is not valid for this Funding model

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2017 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2017-08-01), a learning aim with a source of funding of 105 (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 105) cannot be recorded as a core aim.

(error where LearningDelivery.AimType = 5)

This rule is not triggered by traineeships (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 24)
Error Message: A core aim must not be recorded with a source of funding of 105

Rule Description:
If a T Level technical qualification has been returned  (LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468), in an open T level programme (LearningDelivery.ProgType =  31 and LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not returned)  then it must be the Core aim.

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType =  31 
and 
LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not returned or NULL
and 
LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468 and the LearningDelivery.AimType <> 5)
Error Message: The Aim type must be the Core aim

Rule Description:
If a T Level Foundation Year learning aim class code (ZTPRxxxx) has been returned, then it must be the Core aim.

(error where LearningDelivery.LearningAimRef = ZTPRxxxx and the LearningDelivery.AimType <> 5)
Error Message: This learning aim must be the Core aim

Rule Description:
The Completion status must be a valid lookup (LearningDelivery.CompStatus is a valid lookup on ILR_CompStatus)

(error where LearningDelivery.CompStatus <> valid lookup on ILR_CompStatus)
Error Message: The Completion status is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the Learning actual end date is returned (LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is known), then the Completion status must not be 'the learner is continuing or intending to continue the learning activities leading to the learning aim'

(error where LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 1)


(This rule is not triggered by apprenticeship standard programmes (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 or 99 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25)
Error Message: The Learning actual end date must not be returned for this Completion status

Rule Description:
If the Learning actual end date is not returned (LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is unknown), then the Completion status must be 'learner is continuing or intending to continue the learning activities leading to the learning aim' 

(error where LearningDelivery.CompStatus <> 1)
Error Message: The Learning actual end date must be returned for this Completion status

Rule Description:
If the Outcome is not returned (LearningDelivery.Outcome is unknown), then the Completion status must be 'the learner is continuing or intending to continue the learning activities leading to the learning aim' 

(error where LearningDelivery.CompStatus <> 1)
Error Message: The Outcome must be returned for this completion status

Rule Description:
If the Completion status is 'the learner is continuing or intending to continue the learning activities leading to the learning aim'( LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 1) , then the Outcome must not be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.Outcome is returned)

(This rule is not triggered by apprenticeship standards (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 or 99 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25) or skills bootcamps (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32)
Error Message: The Completion status is not valid for this Outcome

Rule Description:
If the Completion status is 'withdrawn' or 'break in learning' (LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 3 or 6), then the Outcome must not be 'Achieved' or 'Learning activities are complete but outcome is not yet known'

(error where LearningDelivery.Outcome = 1 or 8)

This rule is not triggered by skills bootcamps (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32)
Error Message: The Completion status is not valid for this Outcome

Rule Description:
For programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) that are funded via apprenticeship standards (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25) that ended on or after 1 August 2019 (LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate => 2019-08-01) and the Achievement date is returned (LearningDelivery.AchDate is known) then the completion status must be 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim' (LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 2)

(error where LearningDelivery.CompStatus <>2)
Error Message: The completion status has not been returned

Rule Description:
For programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) that are funded via Skills Bootcamps (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32) and the Achievement date is returned (LearningDelivery.AchDate is known) then the completion status must be 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim' (LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 2)

(error where LearningDelivery.CompStatus <>2)
Error Message: The completion status has not been returned

Rule Description:
If one of the Skills Bootcamp event aims (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749) has been returned, then the completion status should be 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim'

Error where
LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749
and
LearningDelivery.CompStatus <> 2
Error Message: The completion status should be' The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim'.

Rule Description:
For Community Learning, Tailored Learning, 16-19, Adult Skills, Adult Skills Fund, Apprenticeships, Other Adult, Other 16-19 or Non -funded contracts (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10,11, 25, 35, 36, 38, 81, 82, 99), the contract reference number must not be returned 

(error where LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber is known)
Error Message: The Contract reference number must not be returned for this Funding model

Rule Description:
The Delivery location postcode (LearningDelivery.DelLocPostCode) should be either a valid postcode on the list of complete UK postcodes table (Postcodes.PostcodeValidity) or ZZ99 9ZZ

(error where LearningDelivery.DelLocPostCode <> valid lookup on Postcodes.PostcodeValidity or <> ZZ99 9ZZ)

This rule is not triggered by OLASS funded aims  (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034)
Error Message: The Delivery location postcode is not valid

Rule Description:
The Delivery location postcode must conform to the valid postcode format

(error where The first part of the LearningDelivery.DelLocPostCode <> valid format of 1 or 2 capital letters followed by (1 or 2 numbers or 1 number and a capital letter) and the second part of the LearningDelivery.DelLocPostCode <> valid format of (nXX) where n = 0-9 and XX are capital letters excluding C, I, K, M, O and V)
Error Message: The Delivery location postcode is not in the correct format

Rule Description:
If returned, the 'End point assessment organisation' (Learning.Delivery.EPAOrgID) must be valid for the standard being delivered on the planned end date of the apprenticeship 

(error where Learning.Delivery.EPAOrgID <> a valid lookup  (EPAReferenceData Organisation table) on LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate for LearningDelivery.StdCode)
Error Message: The end point assessment organisation is not valid for this standard on this planned end date.

Rule Description:
If an end point assessment price record has been returned (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 2 or 4), there must be an End Point assessment organistation

(error where LearningDelivery.EPAOrgID is unknown)
Error Message: The End point assessment organisation payment record has been returned but there is no record of the End point assessment organisation.

Rule Description:
If the End point assessment organisation has been returned (LearningDelivery.EPAOrgID is known)  there must be an associated price record

(error where  there is no record where (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 2 or 4)
Error Message: The End point assessment organisation has been returned but there is no record of the associated financial record.

Rule Description:
The Funding model (LearningDelivery.FundModel) must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel <> valid lookup on ILR_FundModel)
Error Message: The Funding model is not a valid code

Rule Description:
The Funding model must be 'Non-funded', if the learning aim is financed by an Advanced Learner Loan (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ADL)
 
(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 99)
Error Message: The Funding model is not valid for a learning aim financed by an Advanced Learner Loan

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is part of an apprenticeship (DD07= Y), then the Funding model must not be 'EFA funding'

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 or 82)
Error Message: The Funding model is not valid for a learning aim which is part of an apprenticeship programme

Rule Description:
Funding model 36 must not be used for aims starting before 1 May 2017

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2017-05-01)
Error Message: The Funding model is not valid for starts before 1 May 2017

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is apprenticeship funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36), then it must be an apprenticeship aim

(error where DD07 = N)
Error Message: The funding model is not valid for this aim

Rule Description:
Funded apprenticeship (DD07 = Y), programmes (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), that started on or after 1 May 2017 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2017-05-01), must be Funding model 36

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 36)

This rule is not triggered by non-funded apprenticeships (DD07 = Y and LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99), aims that are a restart (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES), or for (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 353, 355)
Error Message: The funding model is not valid for an apprenticeship programme

Rule Description:
Funded apprenticeship standard (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), programmes (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), that  started before 1 May 2017 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2017-05-01),  must be Funding model 81

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 81)

This rule is not triggered by non-funded apprenticeships (DD07 = Y and LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99)
Error Message: The funding model is not valid for this apprenticeship programme

Rule Description:
For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31) and if a Combined Authority Source of funding has been returned (DD35 = Y)  then the funding model must be Adult skills or Community Learning 

error where LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 35 or 10 )
Error Message: The funding model is not valid for this source of funding

Rule Description:
If a T Level programme has been returned, it must be 16-19 funded

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31 and LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 25)
Error Message: This funding model is not valid for this programme type

Rule Description:
If the Actual Hours for Off the Job Training field has been returned, then the funding model must be Apprenticeships 

(error where there is a record of LearningDelivery.OTJActHours and LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 36)
Error Message: This funding model is not valid when returning this field

Rule Description:
If the 'Free Courses for Jobs Offer' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned, then the aim must be adult skills or Adult Skills Fund funded


(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378 and LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 35 or 38)
Error Message: This funding model is not valid for this LDM code

Rule Description:
If funding model 37 (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37) has been returned, the  programme type must be Skills Bootcamps (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32).

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37 and LearningDelivery.ProgType <> 32)
Error Message: This funding model is not valid for this programme type

Rule Description:
If the Adult Skills Funding model has been returned (fundmodel = 35), the learning start date of the aim must not be on or after 1 August 2024.

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35

This rule is not triggered by
Restarts (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: This funding model is not valid for the start date of the learning aim

Rule Description:
For starts on or after to 1 August 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01) and if a Combined Authority Source of funding has been returned (DD35 = Y)  then the funding model must be Adult Skills Fund or Tailored Learning 

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01
and
DD35 = Y
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 38 or 11 )

This rule is not triggered by
Restarts (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: The funding model is not valid for this source of funding

Rule Description:
Adult Skills Fund funding model (Funding model 38) must not be used for aims starting before 1 August 2024

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38 and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2024-08-01)
Error Message: This Funding model is not valid for starts before 1 August 2024

Rule Description:
Tailored Learning funding model (Funding model 11) must not be used for aims starting before 1 August 2024

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel = 11 and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2024-08-01)
Error Message: This Funding model is not valid for starts before 1 August 2024

Rule Description:
Adult Skills Fund funding model (Funding model 38) must not be used for aims with an Original Learning Start Date before 1 August 2024

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38 and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01 and the LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStart Date < 2024-08-01
Error Message: Funding model 38 cannot  be used if the Original Learning Start Date is before 1 August 2024.  Use Funding model 35.

Rule Description:
If the the Learning actual end date is returned (LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is known), it must not be before the Learning start date

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate < LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: The Learning actual end date must be after the Learning start date

Rule Description:
If the Learning actual end date is returned (LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is known), it must not be after the file preparation date

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate > file preparation date)
Error Message: The Learning actual end date must be before the file preparation date

Rule Description: The Learning aim reference (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef ) must be a valid lookup on LARS
Error Message: The Learning aim reference is not a valid lookup on LARS

Rule Description:
For learning aims ending on or after 1 August 2020 and is 16-19 non apprenticeship then the Learning start date of the aim must be between the validity start date and end date for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database.

error where 
LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate >= 2020-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 or 82
and 
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < LARS_StartDate or >  LARS_EndDate in the LARS_Validity table where (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = 1619_EFA)

Excluding:
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 320, 321, 381
Error Message: The Learning aim reference is not valid in the LARS database for this Funding model and this Learning start date

Rule Description:
For learning aims ending on or after 1 August 2020 and is 16-19 non apprenticeship then the Learning Actual End Date of the aim must be before the validity end date for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database. 

error where 
LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate >= 2020-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 or 82
and
LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate >  LARS_EndDate in the LARS_Validity table where (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = 1619_EFA)

Excluding:
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 320, 321, 381
Error Message: The Learning aim reference is not valid in the LARS database for this Funding model for this teaching year

Rule Description:
For new starts on or after 1 August 2021 and is 16-19 non apprenticeship then the learning aim start date must not be before the validity start date or be after the last date for new starts (unless the restart indicator is present) for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database.

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2021-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 or 82
and
(LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < LARS_StartDate in the LARS Validity table

For new starts on or after 1 August 2024 and is Adult Skills Fund funded then the learning aim start date must not be before the validity start date or be after the last date for new starts (unless the restart indicator is present) for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database.

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38
and
(LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < LARS_StartDate in the LARS Validity table 
or  (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > LARS_LastNewStartDate in the LARS_Validity table
and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = RES does not exist))
 where (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = ADULT_SKILLS)

Excluding:

Devolved authorities (DD35 = Y)
or
Free Courses for Jobs Offer (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378)  
or
Project S Pilot for Adult Skills Fund Providers (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 395)

Rule Description:
If the learning aim has LARS category code Exceptional Devolved Skills Bootcamps the aim must not be funded through Adult Skills.

error where 
LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_CategoryRef  = 67
and 
LearningDelivery.FundModel=35
Error Message: This aim has the 'Exceptional Devolved Skills Bootcamps' category code, please remove the aim from your return

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2024 and is a Skills Bootcamp learner, if one of the HGV Skills Bootcamp event aims (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = Z0060439, Z0009541,Z0060440, Z0060441, Z0060442, Z0060443) has been returned then the Learning Start Date, Learning Planned End Date and the Learning Actual End Date must be the same.

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01
and
LearnningDelivery.ProgType = 32
and
LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef =  Z0060439, Z0009541,Z0060440, Z0060441, Z0060442, Z0060443
and 
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <>  LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate <>LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate
Error Message: The Skills Bootcamp HGV event aim must have the same Learning Start Date, Learning Planned End Date and Learning Actual End Date

Rule Description: The learning aim LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = ZPROG001 is only valid on aims where the LearningDelivery.AimType = 1. Any other combination of these two values is invalid.
Error Message: The Learning aim reference is not valid for a programme aim

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2015 
(LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2015-08-01) and the aim is funded by the adult skills funding methodology (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35, 81) and the learner is either OLASS or RoTL, (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034 or 328)

then they cannot be funded through the Adult skills funding model for Security License to Practise learning aims (LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory.CategoryRef = 22 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef))
Error Message: The learning aim is not valid for Adult skills funding

Rule Description:
For starts between 1 August 2016  (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2016-08-01) and 31 July 2017 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2017-07-31),  if the learning aim is funded through the Adult skills funding model (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35), and is level 3 (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = 3), then the aim must have an entitlement LARS category code

(error where LARS_CategoryRef  <> 38).

This rule is not triggered by apprenticeships (DD07 = Y),
OLASS learners (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034), or
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
or Steel Industries Redundancy Training (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 347), or Providers with an organisation type of Specialist Designated College (LearningProvider.UKPRN = Org_Details.UKPRN and LegalOrgType = USDC).
Error Message: The learning aim is not valid for Adult skills funding

Rule Description:
For starts after 31 July 2016 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 2016-07-31), and on or prior to 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31) and the learning aim is funded through the Adult skills funding model (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35), then the aim must not be a level 4 aim

(error where (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef) and LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = 4)

This rule is not triggered by apprenticeships (DD07 = Y), OLASS learners (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034), or
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES), or 
Full funding for learners in devolved areas (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023)
Error Message: The learning aim is not valid for Adult skills funding

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2016 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2016-08-01)  and the learning aim is funded through the Adult skills funding model (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35, 81), and the learner is claiming other state benefits (EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = BSI and EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode = 3) on LearningDelivery.LearnStartStartDate), then they cannot be funded for License to Practise learning aims

(error where  (LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory.CategoryRef=20 and all child records of category 20 where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef))
Error Message: The learning aim is not valid for Adult skills funding

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2017 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2017-08-01) and on or prior to 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31)  and the learning aim is funded through the Adult skills funding model (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35), and is a level 3 aim (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = 3), the aim must have an entitlement LARS category code

(error where LARS_CategoryRef  <> 38               
or
LARS_CategoryRef  = 38 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <  LARS_EffectiveFrom or LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > LARS_EffectiveTo in LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory)

This rule is not triggered by apprenticeships (DD07 = Y),
OLASS learners (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034), or
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
or
Full funding for learners in devolved areas (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023)
or 
traineeships (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 24) or
or
Free Courses for Jobs Offer (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378)
Error Message: The learning aim is not valid for Adult skills funding

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2017 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2017-08-01) and on or prior to 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31) and the learning aim is funded through the Adult skills funding model (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35), and the learner's prior attainment is level 3 or above (PriorAttain.PriorLevel = (6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 97 or 98), then the aim must not be a level 3 aim. 

(error where (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef) and LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = 3) The PriorAttain used will be the latest where the DateLevelApp<=LearnStartDate

This rule is not triggered by apprenticeships (DD07 = Y) or restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES) or Full funding for learners in devolved areas (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023) or traineeships (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 24) 
or 
Free Courses for Jobs Offer (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378)
and 
(Learner is unemployed with benefits (DD38 = Y) or (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 382))
Error Message: The learning aim is not valid for Adult skills funding

Rule Description:
For starts before 1 August 2021 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2021-08-01) The learning aim validity criteria must be met in Table 1, the learning aim start date must be valid in LARS by looking at the funding validity (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < LARS_StartDate or >  LARS_LastNewStartDate in the LARS_Validity table) for the corresponding Validity category where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef 
or by looking at the category code where applicable (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < LARS_EffectiveFrom or >  LARS_EffectiveTo in the LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory) for the corresponding LARS_CategoryRef where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef
Error Message: The Learning aim reference is not valid in the LARS database for this Funding model and this Learning start date

Rule Description:
If the Learning Support Funding or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary FAM type is returned (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LSF or ALB), then the Date applies from and the Date applies to must be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom or LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo is unknown)
Error Message: The Date applies from or the Date applies to must be returned for this FAM type

Rule Description:
If returned, the Date applies from must be on or after the Learning start date of the aim (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom is known) for apprenticeships, adult and non-funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35, 36, 38, 81 or 99)

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom < LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: The Date applies from must be after the Learning start date

Rule Description:
If Learning Support Funding, Apprenticeship Contract Type, Advanced Learner Loans Bursary or Event Indicator FAM type is not returned (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType <> LSF, ACT, ALB or EVI), then the Date applies from must not be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom is known)
Error Message: The Date applies from must not be returned for this FAM type

Rule Description:
If the Apprenticeship Contract Type FAM type is returned (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ACT), then the Date applies from must be returned.

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom is unknown)
Error Message: The Date applies from must be returned for this FAM type

Rule Description:
If the Event Indicator FAM type is returned (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = EVI), then the Date applies from must be returned.

(error where
there is a record of 
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = EVI LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom is not returned)
Error Message: The Date applies from must be returned for the Event Indicator

Rule Description:
If the Event Indicator (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = EVI) has been returned, the date applies from must be on or after 1 August 2025  

error where
there is a record of LearningDeliveryFAM.Le arnDelFAMType = EVI and  LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom is < 1 August 2025
Error Message: The Date applies from must not be before 1 August 2025

Rule Description:
If the Event Indicator (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = EVI) has been returned, the date applies from must be on or after the learning start date and on or before the learning actual end date of the programme aim.

error where
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = EVI and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom is < LearningDelivery. LearnStartDate  or > LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate of LearningDelivery.AimType = 1
Error Message: The Date applies from must be within the Learning start date and the Learning actual end date

Rule Description:
If returned, the Date applies to (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo is known) must be on or after the Date applies from for this FAM type

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo < LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom)
Error Message: The Date applies to must not be before the Date applies from for this FAM type

Rule Description:
If returned, the Date applies to (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo is known) should not be after the Learning planned end date of the aim

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo > LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate)

This is not triggered by Apprenticeship Contract Type records where the Achievement Date has been returned on the programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and  LearnDelFAMType = ACT and there is a record of LearningDelivery.AchDate)
Error Message: The Date applies to should not be after the Learning planned end date

Rule Description:
If returned, the 'Date To' (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo is known) must not be after the Learning actual end date of the aim for apprenticeships, adult and non-funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35, 36, 38, 81 or 99) 

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo > LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate) 

(This rule does not trigger where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ACT)
Error Message: The Date applies to must not be after the Learning actual end date

Rule Description:
If the FAM type is not Learning Support Funding, Apprenticeship Contract Type, Advanced Learner Loans Bursary  (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType <> LSF, ACT or ALB) , then the Date applies to must not be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo is known)
Error Message: The Date applies to must not be returned for this FAM type

Rule Description:
Where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ACT, If returned, the 'Date To' (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo is known) must not be after the achievement date of the aim for apprenticeships, (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36) 

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo > LearningDelivery.AchDate)
Error Message: The Date applies to must not be after the Learning actual end date

Rule Description:
The Source of funding must be returned for all funding models (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82, 35, 36, 37, 81, 10, 11, 38) 

(error where there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF)
Error Message: The Source of funding must be returned

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is Adult skills or Adult Skills Fund funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 or 38), the full or co-funding indicator must be returned

(error where there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = FFI)
Error Message: The Full or co-funding indicator must be returned for this Funding model

Rule Description:
If a FAM type is returned (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType is returned), the FAM code must be a valid lookup for that FAM type

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode <> valid lookup on ILR_LearnDelFAMTypeFAMCode)
Error Message: The FAM type and code is not valid

Rule Description:
The Learning start date must not be after the 'valid to' date in the FAM Code table

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 'Valid _To' in ILR_LearnDelFAMTypeFAMCode)

This rule is not triggered by restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: The FAM type and code is not valid for this Learning start date

Rule Description:
For 16-19 funding (non apprenticeships) (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 or 82), the Source of funding record must be Adult or 16-19

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 105 or 107)
Error Message: The Source of funding is not valid for this Funding model

Rule Description:
For non-funded provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99), the Source of funding record must not be Adult or 16-19  

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 105 or 107)
Error Message: The Source of funding is not valid for this Funding model

Rule Description:
For apprenticeships, adult, Adult Skills Fund, Community Learning and Tailored Learning (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35, 38, 36, 81,10 and 11), the Source of funding record (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF) must be Adult

(error where  there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 105)

(This rule is not triggered where the Source of Funding is a Combined authority (DD35 = Y))
Error Message: The Source of funding is not valid for this Funding model

Rule Description:
If Learning Delivery Monitoring code for Free Courses for Jobs Offer (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378) is returned, then Learning Aim Start Date must be on or after 1st April 2021

error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378 and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2021-04-01
Error Message: LDM378 can only be returned on aims starting on or after 1st April 2021

Rule Description:
The Learning start date must not be before the 'EffectiveFrom' date  for the Learning delivery monitoring code in the ILR Lookup SubCategory table

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < LookupSubCategory.EffectiveFrom where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = LookupSubCategory.Name = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamCode = LookupSubCategory.Code where the LookupSubCategory.EffectiveFrom is not null)

this rule is not triggered by LDM 368 or 369 (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM LearnDelFAMCode = 368 or LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM.LearnDelFAMCode = 369)
Error Message: The FAM type and code is not valid for this Learning start date

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery Monitoring code for 'Procured Adult Education Budget 2021 (AEB)' (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 379 ) is returned, then the aim must be a Funding model 35 or 10, the source of funding must be Adult funded and the programme type must not be returned

error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 379
and
(LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 35 or 10
or 
(LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode <> 105) 
or
LearningDelivery.ProgType is returned)
Error Message: LDM379 can only be recorded on Funding models 35 or 10, be Adult funded and a programme type must not be returned

Rule Description:
If the learner is direct FE funded LDM320 or a home schooling LDM321 the Learner must be aged 14 

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 320 or 321 and Learner.DateofBirth <14 years on the 31 August)
Error Message: LDM 320 and 321 must only be recorded for learners who are 14

Rule Description:
If LDM 320,321 or 381 are recorded then the funding model must be 25 or 82

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode =320, 321 or 381 and  LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 25 or 82)
Error Message: LDM code 320, 321 and 381 are only used for funding model 25 and 82

Rule Description:
For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31) where the Learning delivery monitoring code for Free Courses for Jobs (Level 3 Offer) for Low Wage Learners has been returned on a learning aim, then the Free Courses for Jobs Offer Learning delivery monitoring code must be returned on the same learning aim.


error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31
and
there is a record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 382 and there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378 on the same learning aim
Error Message: LDM382 and LDM378 must be recorded on the same Learning aim

Rule Description:
If Combined Authority Source of funding indicator has been returned (DD35 = Y) then the aim must not be an Apprenticeship, a Traineeship or a T Level programme.

error where DD35 = Y and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 2, 3, 20, 21, 22, 23, 25, 24, 30 or 31)
Error Message: This programme type cannot be used for this source of funding indicator

Rule Description:
If the 'Free Courses for Jobs Offer' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and the aim has LARS category code 'Free Courses for Jobs  MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications' then the Source of funding indicator must be a Combined Authority.

error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378
and DD35 = N
and LARS_CategoryRef  = 56 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >=  LARS_EffectiveFrom and <= LARS_EffectiveTo in LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory)

This rule is not triggered by restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: A valid Source of funding indicator must be returned for this LARS category code

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is Skills Bootcamps (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32), the full or co-funding indicator must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32 and there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = FFI)
Error Message: The Full or co-funding indicator must be returned for this Programme Type

Rule Description:
For Skills Bootcamps (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32), the Source of funding record must be Adult

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode <> 105)
Error Message: This source of funding is not valid for Skills Bootcamps

Rule Description:
If LDM code 384 is recorded then the funding model must be 81

error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 384 and LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 81
Error Message: The funding model for the Adult T level Pilot must be 81

Rule Description:
For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31) and if the 'Free Courses for Jobs Offer' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and is non devolved funded, then the learning start date of the aim must be between the Effective dates of the LARS category codes 'Free Courses for Jobs rate 1', 'Free Courses for Jobs rate 2'.

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31
and
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378
and
DD35 = N
and 
LARS_CategoryRef = 45 or 46 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <  LARS_EffectiveFrom or > LARS_EffectiveTo in LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory)

This rule is not triggered by restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: The start date of the learning aim must be between the effective dates of the Free Courses for Jobs category codes

Rule Description:
Where the Learning delivery monitoring code for the Adult Education Budget procurement 2021 has been returned on a learning aim, then the Adult Education Budget procurement 2023 Learning delivery monitoring code must not be returned on the same learning aim.

error where there is a record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 379 and there is a record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 388 on the same learning aim
Error Message: LDM379 and LDM388 cannot be recorded on the same Learning aim

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery Monitoring code for Procured Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB) ' (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 388 ) is returned, then the aim must be a Funding model 35, 38, 11 or 10, the source of funding must be Adult funded and the programme type must not be returned

error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 388
and
(LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 35,10,11 or 38
or 
(LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode <> 105) 
or
LearningDelivery.ProgType is returned)
Error Message: LDM388 can only be recorded on Funding models 35, 10, 11 or 38, be Adult funded and a programme type must not be returned

Rule Description:
If Learning Delivery Monitoring code for the Procured Adult Education Budget procurement 2023 (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 388) has been returned then it must be a regulated qualification (LearningDeliveryGenre = EOQ, EOU, EQQ) or be an AEB Procurement 2023 non-regulated learning aim.

error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 388
and
LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef 
and
(LARS_LearningDeliveryGenre <> EOQ, EOU, EQQ
or
LARS_CategoryRef  <> 65)
Error Message: The aim must be a regulated qualification or be a non regulated aim that forms part of the 2023 AEB procurement when using LDM 388.

Rule Description:
If the T Level programme type has been returned (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31), the Source of funding must be 16-19

error where  LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode <> 107
Error Message: If the T Level Programme Type has been returned the Source of Funding must be 16-19.

Rule Description:
From the 1st of August 2023 new community learning starts on funding model 10 must have an ACL code returned

error where 
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2023-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10
and
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ACL has not been returned
Error Message: For community learning starts from the 1st of August 2023 an ACL code is required

Rule Description:
For starts on or after to 1 August 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01) if the 'Free Courses for Jobs Offer' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and the aim is Adult Skills Fund funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38) the aim must have LARS category codes 'Free Courses for Jobs rate 1', 'Free Courses for Jobs rate 2', 'Free Courses for Jobs short' or 'Free Courses for Jobs  MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications'

(error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38
and
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378 and LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38 and LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_CategoryRef  <> 45, 46, 49 or 56 )

Excluding:
Project S Pilot for Adult Skills Fund Providers (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 395)
Error Message: A valid LARS category code must be returned for this LDM code

Rule Description:
For starts after 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 2024-07-31)  and are Adult Skills Fund funded  (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38)  for learners aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim ((LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth) >= 19 years and <=23 years), for aims that are level 2 (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = 2) and not in the entitlement category and the  (LARS_CategoryRef  <> 37), and the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold (there is no record LearningDeliveryFAM provided with LearnDelFamType = LDM and LearnDelFAMCode = 391)  full funding cannot be claimed.

(error where (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = FFI and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1) 

Exclusions:
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES),
English and maths basic skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null)),
Full Funding for learners in devolved areas  (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023),
Error Message: The Full funding indicator is not valid for this learning aim

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01) and where learning delivery category is not 37 and are Adult Skills Fund funded  (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38), for learners aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim ((LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth) >= 19 years and <=23 years), for aims that are level 2 or below (LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = E, 1, or 2 where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef), full funding cannot be claimed if the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold


(error where (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = FFI and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1) and there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 391 on the same learning aim

This is not triggered where:
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES),
English and maths basic skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null)),
Essential Digital Skill (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 43 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))
Digital Functional Skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 44 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null)
Devolved authorities (DD35 = Y))
Error Message: The Full funding indicator is not valid for this learning aim

Rule Description:
For starts after 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 2024-07-31)  and are Adult Skills Fund funded  (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38), for learners aged 24 or over at the start of the learning aim ((LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth) >= 24 years), is a level 2 or below learning aim (LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = E, 1, or 2 where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef) and the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold (there is no record LearningDeliveryFAM provided with LearnDelFamType = LDM and LearnDelFAMCode = 391)  full funding cannot be claimed.

(error where (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = FFI and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1) 

Exclusions:
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES),
English and maths basic skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null)),
Full Funding for learners in devolved areas  (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023), 
Essential Digital Skill (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 43 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))
Digital Functional Skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 44 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))
Error Message: The Full funding indicator is not valid for this learning aim

Rule Description:
For starts after 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 2024-07-31)  and are Adult Skills Fund funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38)  for learners aged 24 or over at the start of the learning aim ((LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth) >= 24 years), for aims that are level 3 (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = 3) and in the entitlement category (LARS_CategoryRef  = 38), and where the Free Courses for Jobs Offer Learning delivery monitoring code has not been returned  the aim cannot be Adult Skills Fund funded  

(error where 
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 2024-07-31
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38
and
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth >= 24 years
and
LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = 3
and
LARS_CategoryRef  = 38
and
there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378

This is not triggered where:
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES),
Full Funding for learners in devolved areas  (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023)
or
Project S Pilot for Adult Skills Fund Providers (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 395)
Error Message: The learning aim is not valid for Adult Skills Fund funding

Rule Description:
From the 1st of August 2024 new Tailored learning starts on funding model 11 must have an ACL code returned

error where 
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 11
and
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ACL has not been returned
Error Message: For Tailored learning starts from the 1st of August 2024 an ACL code is required

Rule Description:
If the 'Project S Pilot for Adult Skills Fund Providers' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned, then the aim must be Adult Skills Fund funded. 

error where
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM 
and 
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 395
and
LearningDelivery.Fundmodel <>38
Error Message: The funding model for LDM 395 must be 38

Rule Description:
If the 'Project S Pilot for Skills Bootcamps' learning delivery monitoring code is returned, then the aim must be Other Adult agency funded. 

error where
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM
and 
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 396
and
LearningDelivery.Fundmodel <> 81
Error Message: The funding model for LDM 396 must be 81

Rule Description:
If the 'Free Courses for Jobs Offer' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and is a combined authority, then the learning start date of the aim must be between the Effective dates of the LARS category code 'Free Courses for Jobs MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications.'

error where
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378
and
DD35 = Y
and 
LARS_CategoryRef = 56 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <  LARS_EffectiveFrom or > LARS_EffectiveTo in LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory)

This rule is not triggered by restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
or
National Skills Fund Free Courses for Jobs Offer rate 1 (LARS_CategoryRef = 45)
or
National Skills Fund Free Courses for Jobs Offer rate 2  (LARS_CategoryRef = 46)
Error Message: The start date of the learning aim must be between the effective dates of the Free Courses for Jobs category code 56

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01) and are Adult Skills Fund funded  (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38), and where learning delivery category is 37  for learners aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim ((LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth) >= 19 years and <=23 years), and has a prior attainment of level 2 or above (PriorAttain.PriorLevel = 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10,  97 or 98), full funding cannot be claimed if the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold


(error where (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = FFI and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1) and there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 391 on the same learning aim

This is not triggered where:
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES),
English and maths basic skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null)),
Essential Digital Skill (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 43 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))
Digital Functional Skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 44 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null)
Devolved authorities (DD35 = Y))
Error Message: The Full funding indicator is not valid for this learning aim

Rule Description:
For starts on or after the 1 August 2025  (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2025-08-01) and are Tailored Learning funded  (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 11) an LDM code is required to show how the learner is funded


(error where  there is no record of (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM  and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode =399 or 400 or 401)
Error Message: An LDM code is required to show how this learner is funded

Rule Description:
The Event indicator must only be returned for Skills Bootcamps

error where
there is a record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = EVI and LearningDelivery.ProgType <> 32 or not returned
Error Message: The Event Indicator is not valid for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If the Event Indicator (EVI) has been returned, it must be on the programme aim. 

error where
there is a record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = EVI and LearningDelivery.AimType <> 1
Error Message: The Event Indicator must be returned on the Programme aim

Rule Description:
If the Source of Funding is East Midlands Combined County Authority, York and North Yorkshire Combined Authority or Cornwall Council, the funding model must not be Adult Skills or Community Learning.

Error where:
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF
and
 LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 121,122,123
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 or 10
Error Message: This Source of Funding is not valid for Adult Skills (FM35) or Community Learning (FM10)

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is not part of a funded apprenticeship programme, then the Eligibility for enhanced apprenticeship funding must not be returned 

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = EEF)

(This rule is not triggered for funded apprenticeships (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35, 36 or 81 and DD07 = Y))
Error Message: The Eligibility for enhanced apprenticeship funding is only valid for apprenticeship aims

Rule Description:
The Learning delivery monitoring code for 'Proxy learning aim' (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 118) must not be used if the learning aim has ended

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is known)
Error Message: This Learning delivery monitoring code must not be returned where the Learning actual end date is completed

Rule Description:
If the return number is R12, R13 or R14 then the Learning delivery monitoring code for 'Proxy learning aim' must not be used.

(error where the return number = R12, R13 or R14 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 118 has been used)
Error Message: This Learning delivery monitoring code is not valid for this return

Rule Description:
If the FAM type is SOF, FFI, EEF, RES, ADL, ACL, AFL, ASL or FLN then there must be only one occurrence

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF, FFI, EEF, RES, ADL, ACL, AFL, ASL or FLN and occurrence > 1)
Error Message: There must not be more than one record with a FAM type of SOF, FFI,  EEF, RES, ADL, ACL, AFL, ASL or FLN

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is not funded through Adult skills, Adult Skills Fund, Skills Bootcamps, Tailored Learning or Community learning  (LearningDelivery.FundModel <> (35, 37, 38, 81, 11 or 10), then the Full or co-funding indicator must not be returned 

(error where there is record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = FFI)
Error Message: The Full or co-funding indicator must not be returned for this Funding model

Rule Description:
If the FAM type is LDM, there must be no more than six occurrences

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and occurrences > 6)

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ADL)

(error where there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ADL)

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is not funded by Funding model 99 (LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 99), then the Advanced Learner Loans Bursary fund indicator must not be returned 

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ALB)
Error Message: The Advanced Learner Loans Bursary fund indicator is not required for this Funding model

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2013-08-01) for this funding model (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 81 or 82), then there should be a Learning delivery monitoring

(error where there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM)

If the learning aim is part of an apprenticeship programme (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and DD07 = Y), then the Advanced Learner Loans indicator must not be returned

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ADL)

Rule Description:
If the Learning Delivery FAM Type is Family English, Maths or Language (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = FLN), then the funding model must be Adult skills or Adult Skills Fund

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 35,or 38)
Error Message: The Funding model must be Adult skills or Adult Skills Fund

Rule Description:
The FAM type of Learning Support Funding must not be returned for 16-19, Community learning and Non-funded aims (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82, 10, or 99)

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LSF)
Error Message: Learning Support Funding must not be returned for this Funding model

Rule Description:
If Advanced Learner Loan Bursary rate 1 or 3 are recorded (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ALB and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1) or  (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ALB and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 3), then the provider must be a contract funded provider

(error where FCT for this LearningProvider.UKPRN where ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = ALLBC2526)
Error Message: Learning delivery FAM type' is wrong. The Advanced Learner Bursary rate 1 or 3 can't be used when the aim is grant funded. Check 'FAM type' is correct

Rule Description:
If 'Entitlement to 16-18 apprenticeship funding' is returned (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = EEF and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 2) then the learning aim must be fully funded

(error where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = FFI and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 2)

(This rule is not triggered by apprenticeship standards (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25) or LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36)
Error Message: The combination of EEF and FFI codes is not valid

Rule Description:
For starts prior to 1 August 2016 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2016-08-01), adult skills funded learners (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35), aged 24 or over at the start of the learning aim ((LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate - Learner.DateOfBirth) >= 24 years), which are level 2 or below (LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = E, 1, or 2 where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef), full funding cannot be claimed

(error where (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = FFI and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 1)

(This rule is not triggered by apprenticeships (DD07 = Y),
or
OLASS learners (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034) or
RoTL (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 328), learners on active benefits (DD12 = Y),
Unemployed learners on other state benefits (DD21 = Y),
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES),
English and maths basic skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null)),

Providers with an organisation type of Specialist Designated College (LearningProvider.UKPRN = Org_Details.UKPRN and LegalOrgType = USDC) or
Steel Industries Redundancy Training (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 347)

Where a Short Funding Initiative Learning Delivery Monitoring code has been returned for this UKPRN, the Learning Start Date must be between the Effective From date and Effective To date in the Short Term Initiative table.
