For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31) if the aim in Adult skills funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35) and the aim has LARS category code 'Free Courses for Jobs only', the aim must have the  'Free Courses for Jobs Offer Offer' learning delivery monitoring code

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35 and LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_CategoryRef  = 48 and no Learning Delivery Funding and Monitoring (FAM) record exists where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378)

(This rule is not triggered by Devolved authorities DD35=Y)
Error Message: A valid LDM code must be returned for this LARS category code

Rule Description:
The Learning planned end date (LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate), must not be before the Learning aim start date (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate < LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: The Learning planned end date must not be before the Learning start date

Rule Description:
The Learning planned end date (LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate), must be less than 10 years after the Learning start date (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate - LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 10 years)
Error Message: The Learning planned end date must not be 10 years or more after the Learning start date

Rule Description:
The Learning start date must not be more than 10 years before the start of the current teaching year

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 10 years before the start of the current teaching year)
Error Message: The Learning start date is more than 10 years before the start of the current teaching year

Rule Description:
The Learning start date must not be after the current teaching year

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > the end of the current teaching year)

This rule is not triggered for apprenticeships (DD07 =Y) 
or T Level programmes (LearningDelivery.FundModel 25 and LearningDelivery.ProgType 31)
or 
Skills Bootcamps (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32)
Error Message: The Learning start date must not be after the end of the current teaching year

Rule Description:
The Learning start date must be after the learner's Date of birth.

(error where Learner.DateOfBirth is known and >= LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: The Learning start date must not be on or before the learner's Date of birth

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is part of an apprenticeship (DD07 = Y), then the Learning start date must not be more than one year after the end of the current teaching year

(error where  LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 1 year after the end of the current teaching year)
Error Message: The Learning start date must not be more than one year in the future

Rule Description:
If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship standard programme (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), then the Learning start date of the programme (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), must not be after the 'Effective to' date for this Standard in the Standard table in LARS

(Error where (LARS_Standard_EffectiveTo <> null and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > LARS_Standard_EffectiveTo) from the LARS_Standard table where (LARS_Standard = LearningDelivery.StdCode))

This rule is not triggered by restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: The Learning start date of the apprenticeship standard programme must not be after the Effective to date of this apprenticeship standard

Rule Description:
If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship standard programme (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), then the Learning start date of the component aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 3), must not be after the 'Effective to' date for this Standard in the Standard table in LARS

(Error where (LARS_Standard_EffectiveTo <> null and DD18 > LARS_Standard_EffectiveTo) from the LARS_Standard table where (LARS_Standard = LearningDelivery.StdCode)

This rule is not triggered by restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: The Learning start date of the apprenticeship standard programme must not be after the Effective to date of this component aim for this standard

Rule Description:
If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship standard programme (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), then the Learning start date of the programme must not be before the 'Effective from' date for this Standard in the Standard table in LARS

(error where LARS_Standard_EffectiveFrom is known and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < LARS_Standard_EffectiveFrom) from the LARS_Standard table where (LARS_Standard = LearningDelivery.StdCode)

(this rule is not triggered by restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: The Learning start date of the apprenticeship standard programme must not be before the Effective From date of this apprenticeship standard

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2020 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2020-08-01), if the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship standard programme (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), then the Learning start date of the programme (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1), must not be after the 'LastDateStarts' date for this Standard in the Standard table in LARS

(Error where (LARS_Standard_LastDateStarts <> null and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > LARS_Standard_LastDateStarts) from the LARS_Standard table where (LARS_Standard = LearningDelivery.StdCode))

This rule is not triggered by restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: The Learning start date of the apprenticeship standard programme must not be after the LastDateStarts date of this apprenticeship standard

Rule Description:
The Learning start date of the Skills Bootcamp programme aim (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1) must not be before the start date of the contract

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < ContractAllocation.StartDate where the LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber = ContractAllocation.ContractAllocationNumber)
Error Message: The Learning start date must not be before the start date of the contract

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is Skills Bootcamp funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37) the learning start date must be on or after 1 August 2022.
(Error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 01/08/2022)
Error Message: This funding model is not valid for starts before 1 August 2022

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2019 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2019-08-01) and on or prior to 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31), are adult skills or Community Learning funded (LearningDelivery.Fundmodel = 35 or LearningDelivery.Fundmodel = 10), the Learning start date postcode (LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode) must be returned and be a valid postcode on the list of complete UK postcodes table

(error where LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode <> (a valid lookup on Postcodes.PostcodeValidity)

this rule is not triggered where
LearningDelivery.LSDPostCode = ZZ99 9ZZ
or
aims that are part of a traineeship (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 24)
or apprenticeship frameworks (DD07 = Y) or are  programme component aims (LearningDelivery.Aimtype = 3)
Error Message: The Learning start date postcode is not valid

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2019 and before 1 August 2021 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2019-08-01 and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2021-08-01), are adult skills or Community Learning funded (LearningDelivery.Fundmodel = 35 or LearningDelivery.Fundmodel = 10), the Learning start date postcode (LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode) must be valid on the learning aim start date (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate) for the Source of funding listed

error where DD35 = Y and LSDPostcode does not exist in the Postcodes.AEBPostcodes
Or
(LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode for the LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF) <> Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding) for the LSDPostcode
Or 
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.EffectiveFrom date for the LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode where ((LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode for the LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF) = Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding)
Or
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.EffectiveTo date for the LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode where ((LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode for the LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF) = Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding

(this rule is not triggered where the Programme Type has been returned (ProgType is known) 
Providers with an organisation type of Long term Residential College (LearningProvider.UKPRN = Org_Details.UKPRN and LongTermResid=1), 
Restarts (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Postcode exclusions (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 001)
OLASS learning aims (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 034)
LearningDelivery.LSDPostCode = ZZ99 9ZZ
Error Message: The learning aim start date postcode is not valid on the start date of the learning aim and the source of funding

Rule Description:
If returned the Learning start date postcode must conform to the valid postcode format

(error where The first part of the LearningDelivery.LSDPostCode <> valid format of 1 or 2 capital letters followed by (1 or 2 numbers or 1 number and a capital letter) and the second part of the LearningDelivery.LSDPostCode <> valid format of (nXX) where n = 0-9 and XX are capital letters excluding C, I, K, M, O and V)
Error Message: The Learning start date postcode is not in the correct format

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2021 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2021-08-01) and on or prior to 31 July 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2024-07-31), are adult skills or Community Learning funded (LearningDelivery.Fundmodel = 35 or LearningDelivery.Fundmodel = 10), the Learning start date postcode (LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode) must be valid on the learning aim start date (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate) for the Source of funding listed

error where LSDPostcode does not exist in the Postcodes.AEBPostcodes
Or
((LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode for the LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF) <> Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding) for the LSDPostcode
Or 
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.EffectiveFrom date for the LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode where ((LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode for the LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF) = Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding)
Or
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.EffectiveTo date for the LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode where ((LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode for the LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF) = Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding)

(this rule is not triggered where
Restarts (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
or
Postcode exclusions (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 001)
or
LearningDelivery.LSDPostCode = ZZ99 9ZZ
Error Message: The learning aim start date postcode is not valid on the start date of the learning aim and the source of funding

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01), are Adult Skills Fund or Tailored Learning funded (LearningDelivery.Fundmodel = 38 or LearningDelivery.Fundmodel = 11), the Learning start date postcode (LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode) must be returned and be a valid postcode on the list of complete UK postcodes table

(error where LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode <> (a valid lookup on Postcodes.PostcodeValidity)

this rule is not triggered where
LearningDelivery.LSDPostCode = ZZ99 9ZZ
or
are  programme component aims (LearningDelivery.Aimtype = 3)
Error Message: The Learning start date postcode is not valid

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2024 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2024-08-01), are Adult Skills Fund or Tailored Learning funded (LearningDelivery.Fundmodel = 38 or LearningDelivery.Fundmodel = 11), the Learning start date postcode (LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode) must be valid on the learning aim start date (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate) for the Source of funding listed

error where LSDPostcode does not exist in the Postcodes.AEBPostcodes
Or
((LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode for the LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF) <> Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding) for the LSDPostcode
Or 
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.EffectiveFrom date for the LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode where ((LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode for the LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF) = Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding)
Or
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.EffectiveTo date for the LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode where ((LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode for the LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = SOF) = Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding)

(this rule is not triggered where
Restarts (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Postcode exclusions (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 001)
LearningDelivery.LSDPostCode = ZZ99 9ZZ
Error Message: The learning aim start date postcode is not valid on the start date of the learning aim and the source of funding

Rule Description:
If the Original learning start date is returned  (LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is known), then it must not be more than 10 years before the Learning start date

(error where LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate > 10 years before LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: The Original learning start date must not be more than 10 years before the Learning start date

Rule Description:
If the Original learning start date is returned  (LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is known), then it must be before the Learning start date

(error where LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate >= LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: The Original learning start date must not be on or after the Learning start date

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is funded by 16-19 non-apprenticeship or community learning provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82 or 10), then the Original learning start date must not be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82 or 10 and LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is known)
Error Message: The Original learning start date must not be returned

Rule Description:
If the Original learning start date is returned (LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is known), then there must be a Restart indicator

(error where there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAMType.FAMType = RES)
Error Message: The Restart indicator has not been returned

Rule Description:
If the Original learning start date is returned (LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is known), and the aim is Adult skills funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35), then the Original learning start date must be between the validity start date and end date in the LARS database for this learning aim

(error where there is no record where LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is between LARS_StartDate and LARS_EndDate in the LARS_Validity table where (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = ADULT_SKILLS, UNEMPLOYED or OLASS_ADULT)

This rule is not triggered by apprenticeships (DD07= Y),
Free Courses for Jobs Offer (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378)
Error Message: The Learning aim reference is Adult skills funded and is not valid in the LARS database on this Original learning start date

Rule Description:
If the Original learning start date is returned (LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is known), and the aim is Other Adult skills funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 81) or part of an apprenticeship standard (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), then the Original learning start date must be between the validity start date and end date in the LARS database for this learning aim

(error where there is no record where LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is between LARS_StartDate and LARS_EndDate in the LARS_Validity table where (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = ANY)
Error Message: The Learning aim reference is not valid in the LARS database for this Funding model on this Original learning start date

Rule Description:
If the Original learning start date is returned (LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is known), and the aim is financed by an Advanced Learner Loan (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = ADL), then the Original learning start date must be between the validity start date and end date in the LARS database for this learning aim

(error where there is no record where LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is between LARS_StartDate and LARS_EndDate in the LARS_Validity table where (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = ADV_LEARN_LOAN)
Error Message: The Learning aim reference is financed by an Advanced Learner Loan and is not valid in the LARS database on this Original learning start date

Rule Description:
If the Original learning start date is returned (LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is known), and the aim is part of an apprenticeship that started on or after 1 May 2017 (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36), then the original learning start date cannot be before 1 May 2017

(error where LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate < 2017-05-01)
Error Message: The Original learning start date for this funding model must not be before 1 May 2017

Rule Description:
If the Original learning start date is returned (LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is known), and the aim is Skills Bootcamp funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37), then the Original learning start date must be between the validity start date and end date in the LARS database for this learning aim
(error where there is no record where LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is between LARS_StartDate and LARS_EndDate in the LARS_Validity table where (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = ANY)
Error Message: The Learning aim reference is not valid in the LARS database for this Funding model on this Original learning start date

Rule Description:
If the Original learning start date is returned (LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is known), and the aim is Adult Skills Fund funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38), then the Original learning start date must be between the validity start date and end date in the LARS database for this learning aim

(error where LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is returned 
and LearningDelivery.FundModel = 38
and there is no record where LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is between LARS_StartDate and LARS_EndDate in the LARS_Validity table where (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = ADULT_SKILLS)

This rule is not triggered by:
Free Courses for Jobs Offer (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378)
Error Message: The Learning aim reference is Adult skills funded and is not valid in the LARS database on this Original learning start date

Rule Description:
For Community Learning, 16-19 or Other 16-19 (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82 or 10), the Other funding adjustment field must not be returned 

(error where LearningDelivery.OtherFundAdj is known)
Error Message: The Other funding adjustment must not be returned for this Funding model

Rule Description:
If returned, the Actual Hours for Off the Job training must be returned on the programme aim 

(error where there is a record of LearningDelivery.OTJActHours and LearningDelivery.AimType <> 1)
Error Message: Actual Hours for Off the Job Training must be returned on the programme aim

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2019, where an apprenticeship has completed, the Actual Hours for Off the Job Training must be returned.
 
(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2019-08-01 and LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and  LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 2 and LearningDelivery.OTJActHours is not returned)

This rule is not triggered by
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: Actual Hours for Off the Job Training must be returned

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2022, where an apprenticeship has withdrawn, the Actual Hours for Off the Job Training must be returned.
 
(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2022-08-01 and LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and  LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 3 and LearningDelivery.OTJActHours is not returned)
Error Message: Actual Hours for Off the Job Training must be returned for withdrawn learners

Rule Description:
If returned, the Outcome (LearningDelivery.Outcome is known), must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDelivery.Outcome <> valid lookup on ILR_Outcome)
Error Message: The Outcome is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the Achievement date is returned (LearningDelivery.AchDate is known), then the Outcome must be 'Achieved'

(error where LearningDelivery.Outcome <> 1)

(This is not triggered for Apprenticeships standards (Fundmodel =36 and ProgType =25))
Error Message: The Achievement date must not be returned for this Outcome

Rule Description:
If the Outcome is 'Achieved' (LearningDelivery.Outcome = 1), there must be an Learning actual end date

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is unknown)

This rule is not triggered by skills bootcamps (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32)
Error Message: The Learning actual end date must be returned for this Outcome

Rule Description:
If the Outcome is 'Learning activities are complete but the outcome is not yet known' (LearningDelivery.Outcome = 8) then the Completion status must be 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim'

(error where LearningDelivery.CompStatus <> 2)

(This rule is not triggered by apprenticeship standard programmes (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 or 99 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25) or skills bootcamps  (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32)
Error Message: The Completion status is not valid for this Outcome

Rule Description:
If the Outcome is 'No achievement'  (LearningDelivery.Outcome = 3), then the Completion status must not be 'The learner is continuing or intending to continue the learning activities leading to the learning aim'

(error where LearningDelivery.Outcome = 3 and LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 1)
Error Message: The Completion status is not valid for this Outcome

Rule Description:
If the Outcome has been returned (LearningDelivery.Outcome is known), then an actual end date must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.Outcome = is known and LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is unknown)

Excluding:
Skills Bootcamps  (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 37 and LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32)
Error Message: If an outcome code has been returned an actual end date must be returned

Rule Description:
If the Learning Actual End Date has been returned then the Outcome must be returned.

error where:
there is a record of LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate
and
there is no record of LearningDelivery.Outcome
Error Message: If the Learning Actual End Date has been returned then the Outcome must be returned

Rule Description:
If returned, the Outcome grade (LearningDelivery.OutGrade is known) must be a valid lookup in Appendix Q

(error where LearningDelivery.OutGrade <> a valid lookup on ILR_OutGrade)
Error Message: The Outcome grade is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the Outcome is 'Learning activities are complete but the outcome is not yet known' or is not returned (LearningDelivery.Outcome = 8 or unknown), then the Outcome grade must not be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.OutGrade is known)
Error Message: The Outcome grade must not be returned for this Outcome

Rule Description:
If the Outcome grade is  'FL', 'U', 'N', 'X' or 'Y' (LearningDelivery.OutGrade = FL, U, N, X or Y)  the Outcome must not be 'Achieved' 

(error where LearningDelivery.Outcome = 1)
Error Message: The Outcome grade is not valid for this Outcome

Rule Description:
If the Outcome is 'No achievement'  (LearningDelivery.Outcome = 3) and the Outcome grade must be FL', 'U', 'N', 'X' or 'Y' or not returned

(error where LearningDelivery.OutGrade <> FL, U, N, X, Y or unknown)
Error Message: The Outcome grade is not valid for this Outcome

Rule Description:
If the Learning actual end date is on or after 1 August 2014 (LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate >= 2014-08-01), and the Outcome is 'Achieved' (LearningDelivery.Outcome = 1), and the aim is a GCSE, A-level, AS-level or A2 level ((where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef) and the LARS_LearnAimRefType = 0001, 0002, 0003, 1413, 1422, 1430, 1433, 1434, 1435, 1453 or 2999),  and the Outcome grade has been returned (LearningDelivery.OutGrade is known), then it must be a valid grade for that qualification

(error where LearningDelivery.OutGrade does not match the assoicated  valid Grade for the LearnAimRef type in AppendixQ.Annex1)
Error Message: The Outcome grade is not valid for this type of qualification

Rule Description:
If the Subcontracted or partnership UKPRN is returned (LearningDelivery.PartnerUKPRN is known) it must be a valid lookup on the UKPRN table (Org_PartnerUKPRN)

(error where LearningDelivery.PartnerUKPRN  <> valid lookup on Org_PartnerUKPRN)
Error Message: The Subcontracted or partnership UKPRN is not valid

Rule Description:
The Subcontracted or partnership UKPRN must not be returned for programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 )

(error where LearningDelivery.PartnerUKPRN is known)
Error Message: The Subcontracted or partnership UKPRN must not be on programme aims

Rule Description:
The Subcontracted or partnership UKPRN (LearningDelivery.PartnerUKPRN), must not be the same as the lead provider's UKPRN (LearningProvider.UKPRN)

(error where LearningDelivery.PartnerUKPRN = LearningProvider.UKPRN)
Error Message: The Subcontracted or partnership UKPRN must not be the same as the Learning provider UKPRN

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2019, programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1)
(LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2019-08-01), Planned hours must be returned for apprenticeships (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36) 

(error where LearningDelivery.PHours is unknown)
Error Message: Planned hours must be returned for this funding model

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2020, programme aims (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1)
(LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2020-08-01), Planned hours must be returned for  T Level programmes (LearningDelivery.FundModel 25 and LearningDelivery.ProgType 31)

(error where LearningDelivery.PHours is unknown)
Error Message: Planned hours must be returned for this funding model

Rule Description:
If a T Level programme has been returned, the Planned hours must be greater than zero on the programme aim

(error where LearningDelivery.AimType  = 1 and LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25 and LearningDelivery.ProgType =  31 and LearningDelivery.PHours <= 0)
Error Message: Planned hours must be greater than zero on the programme aim

Rule Description:
Planned Hours (LearningDelivery.Phours) must not be returned for 16-19 study programmes (LearningDelivery.FundModel 25 and LearningDelivery.ProgType <> 31 or null)

(error where LearningDelivery.PHours is not null)
Error Message: Planned hours must not be returned for 16-19 study programmes

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2022 and on or prior to 31 July 2025, where the planned hours field has been returned, the value must not be less than 278 hours for apprenticeships.

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2022-08-01 
and
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36
and if returned LearningDelivery.PHours < 278)

(This rule is not triggered by Restarts (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: Planned hours must not be less than 278 hours

Rule Description:
For Tailored learning, learning aims the Planned hours must be returned (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 11) 

(error where LearningDelivery.PHours is unknown)
Error Message: For Tailored learning funded aims the planned hours must be recorded which represent the timetable hours for delivery.

Rule Description:
For starts on or after 1 August 2025,  where the planned hours field has been returned, the value must not be less than 187 hours for apprenticeships.

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2025-08-01 
and
LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36
and 
LearningDelivery.PHours < 187)

(This rule is not triggered by Restarts (LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Error Message: Planned hours must not be less than 187 hours

Rule Description:
For Community Learning, 16-19, Other 16-19 or Non Funded provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82, 10 or 99), and are not Advanced Learner Loans (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType <> ADL), the Funding adjustment for prior learning must not be returned 

(error where LearningDelivery.PriorLearnFundAdj is known)
Error Message: The Funding adjustment for prior learning must not be returned

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is part of a programme (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 or 3), then the Programme type must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType is unknown)
Error Message: The Programme type must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is not part of a programme (LearningDelivery.AimType = 4), then the Programme type must not be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType is known)
Error Message: The Programme type must not be returned for this Aim type

Rule Description:
If returned, the Programme type (LearningDelivery.ProgType is known), must be a valid lookup on the start date of the aim

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType  <> valid lookup on ILR_ProgType where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate > 'Valid_To' date in ILR_ProgType)
Error Message: The Programme type is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the apprenticeship standard programme type (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25) has been returned, the aim must be apprenticeship funded

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 81 or 36)

This rule is not triggered by non funded apprenticeships (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99).
Error Message: The Programme type is not a valid code for this Funding model

Rule Description:
If the T level industry placement aim (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = ZWRKX003) has been returned then the T level programme type must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = ZWRKX003 and LearningDelivery.ProgType <> 31 or not returned)

This rule is not triggered by the Adult T level pilot
(LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 384)
or
Non funded T Levels (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99)
Error Message: The T Level programme type must be used for this work experience learning aim

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is a T Level Technical qualification in the LARS database (LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468) then the T Level programme type must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468 and LearningDelivery.ProgType <> 31 or not returned)

This rule is not triggered by the Adult T level pilot
(LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 384)
or
Non funded T Levels (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99)
Error Message: A valid T Level programme type must be used for this learning aim reference

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is a T Level Occupational Specialism learning aim class code (ZTLOSxxx) then the T Level programme type must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = ZTLOSxxx and LearningDelivery.ProgType <> 31 or not returned)

This rule is not triggered by the Adult T level pilot
(LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 384)
or
Non funded T Levels (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99)
Error Message: The T Level programme type must be used for this learning aim reference

Rule Description:
If the T Level Foundation Year programme type has been returned, then the T Level Foundation Year learning aim class code (ZTPRxxxx) must be returned in the programme

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 30  and there is no record of LearningDelivery.AimType = 5 where LearningDelivery.LearningAimRef = ZTPRxxxx)
Error Message: The T Level Foundation Year programme type must be used for this learning aim reference

Rule Description:
If there is no record of a T Level Technical qualification (LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468) in the programme, then the T level programme type must not be returned

(error where there is no record of LearningDelivery.AimType = 5 where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468 and there is a record of LearningDelivery.ProgType  = 31)
Error Message: This programme type cannot be used for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is a T Level Foundation Year learning aim class code (ZTPRxxxx) then the T Level Foundation Year programme type must be returned.

(error where LearningDelivery.LearningAimRef = ZTPRxxxx and LearningDelivery. ProgType <> 30 or not returned)

This rule is not triggered by the Adult T level pilot
(LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 384)
Error Message: The T Level Foundation Year programme type must be used for this learning aim reference

Rule Description:
If the Skills Bootcamp programme type has been returned (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32) the funding model must be 37  

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 32 and LearningDelivery.FundModel is <> 37 )
Error Message: The Funding model is not a valid code for this Programme Type

Rule Description:
If the combined authority programme type has been returned (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 33) the Source of funding must be a combined authority.

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 33 and DD35 = N)
Error Message: The Source of funding is not a valid code for this programme type

Rule Description:
If one of the Skills Bootcamp event aims (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749) has been returned then the Skills Bootcamp programme type must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749 and LearningDelivery.ProgType <> 32 or not returned)

This rule is not triggered by:
Project S Pilot for Skills Bootcamps (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = 396)
Error Message: This programme type cannot be used for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If one of the Skills Bootcamp subject learning aims has been returned (LARS_CategoryRef  = 62) then the Skills Bootcamps programme type must be returned.

error where 
LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_CategoryRef  = 62
and
LearningDelivery.ProgType <> 32

This rule is not triggered by:
Project S Pilot for Skills Bootcamps (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = 396)
Error Message: The Skills Bootcamp programme type must be returned when a Skills Bootcamp subject learning aim has been returned.

Rule Description:
If returned, Provider specified delivery monitoring occurrence (ProviderSpecDeliveryMonitoring.ProvSpecDelMonOccur is known) must be 'A', 'B', 'C' or 'D'

(error where ProviderSpecDeliveryMonitoring.ProvSpecDelMonOccur <> 'A' , 'B', 'C' or 'D')
Error Message: The Provider specified delivery monitoring occurrence is not 'A' , 'B', 'C' or 'D'

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is part of an apprenticeship standard programme (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25), then the Apprenticeship standard code must be returned 

(error where LearningDelivery.StdCode is unknown)
Error Message: The Apprenticeship standard code must be returned

Rule Description:
If returned the apprenticeship standard code (LearningDelivery.Stdcode) must be a valid look up on the LARS validity table (LARS_StandardCode on the LARS_StandardValidity tables)

(error where LearningDelivery.Stdcode <> valid lookup on LARS_StandardCode on the LARS_StandardValidity tables)
Error Message: The Apprenticeship standard code is not valid

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is not part of an apprenticeship standard (LearningDelivery.ProgType <> 25), then the Apprenticeship standard code must not be returned 

(error where LearningDelivery.StdCode is known)
Error Message: The Apprenticeship standard code must not be returned

Rule Description:
If returned, the Software supplier aim identifier  (LearningDelivery.SWSupAimId is known) should adhere to the UUID standard

(error where LearningDelivery.SWSupAimId <> valid UUID)
Error Message: The Software supplier aim identifier is not in the correct format

Rule Description:
For Tailored learning provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 11),  if a learning aim is recorded completed or withdrawn (LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 2 or 3) the Tailored learning outcomes field must be returned 

(error where LearningDelivery.TLout is unknown)
Error Message: A completed or withdrawn Tailored Learning funded aim must have a Talored learning outcome recorded

Rule Description:
If returned, the Tlout identifier (LearningDelivery.Tlout is known) must be a valid lookup on the Tlout identifier table

(error where  <> valid lookup on the Tlout table)
Error Message: The Tlout identifier must be a valid lookup

Rule Description:
If the Withdrawal reason is returned (LearningDelivery.WithdrawReason is known), it must be a valid lookup

(error where LearningDelivery.WithdrawReason <> valid lookup on ILR_WithdrawReason)
Error Message: The Withdrawal reason is not a valid code

Rule Description:
If the Completion status is 'Withdrawn (LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 3), then the Withdrawal reason must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.WithdrawReason is unknown)
Error Message: The Withdrawal reason must be returned for this Completion status

Rule Description:
If the Completion status is 'the learner is 'continuing', 'the learner has completed' or 'the learner has temporarily withdrawn due to an agreed break in learning' (LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 1, 2 or 6), the Withdrawal reason must not be returned 

(error where LearningDelivery.WithdrawReason is known
Error Message: The Withdrawal reason must not be returned for this Completion status

Rule Description:
The 'OLASS learner withdrawn' code (LearningDelivery.WithdrawReason = 28) must only be used for OLASS funded learning aims (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode  = 034)

(error where no record exists where (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode  = 034)
Error Message: The Withdrawal reason is only valid for OLASS - Offenders in custody

Rule Description:
If withdrawal reason 'Industry placement learner withdrawn' is returned  (LearningDelivery.WithdrawReason = 48) the aim reference must be an industry placement (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = ZWRKX002)

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef <> ZWRKX002)
Error Message: The Withdrawal reason is only valid for Industrial placements

Rule Description:
If returned, the Work placement identifier (LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEmpId is known) must be a valid lookup on the EDS system of all available employer numbers or be 999999999 

(error where LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEmpId is <> (999999999 or a valid lookup on edrs_lookup)
Error Message: The Work placement employer identifier is not valid

Rule Description:
If returned, the Work placement employer identifier (LearningDeliveryWorkPlacment.WorkPlaceEmpId is known and not 999999999), must pass the check sum calculation in DD14

(error where DD14 <> character 9 of LearningDeliveryWorkPlacment.WorkPlaceEmpId)
Error Message: The Work placement employer identifier does not pass the checksum calculation

Rule Description:
If returned, the Work placement end date (LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEndDate is known) must be on or after the Work placement start date

(error where LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEndDate < LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceStartDate
Error Message: The Work placement end date must be after the Work placement start date

Rule Description:
If returned, the Work placement end date (LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEndDate is known) must be on or before the Learning actual end date

(error where LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEndDate > LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate)
Error Message: The Work placement end date must be before the Learning actual end date

Rule Description:
If the T Level industry placement aim has been returned then a work placement record must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = ZWRKX003 and there is no record of LearningDelivery.WorkPlacement)
Error Message: A Work placement record must be returned

Rule Description:
The Work placement mode (LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceMode is known) must be a valid lookup

(error where <> valid lookup on ILR_WorkPlaceMode)
Error Message: The Work placement mode must be a valid code

Rule Description:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2014 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate => 2014-08-01) and is a work experience aim, a Supported Internship or an Industry placement learning aim  (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = (Z0007834, Z0007835, Z0007836, Z0007837, Z0007838, Z0002347, ZWRKX001 or ZWRKX002)) then a Work Placement record must be returned

(error where here is no record of LearningDelivery.WorkPlacement)
Error Message: The Work Placement record must be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
The Work placement start date must be on or after the Learning start date of the learning aim

(error where LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceStartDate < LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate)
Error Message: The Work placement start date must be after the Learning start date

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is not work experience (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef <> (Z0007834, Z0007835, Z0007836, Z0007837, Z0007838, Z0002347, ZWRKX001, ZWRKX002 or ZWRKX003) then a Work Placement record must not be returned.

(error where there is a record of LearningDelivery.WorkPlacement)
Error Message: A Work placement record must not be returned for this learning aim

Rule Description:
If the learning aim is a CDF Industry Placement or T Level work experience aim (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = ZWRKX002 or ZWRKX003), then the 16-19 funding model must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.FundModel <> 25)

This rule is not triggered by:
Non funded T Levels (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99)
Error Message: 16-19 Funding model must be returned for this learning aim
